Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (En,.name: Greatest Hits
Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (En,.original_desc:
In Driver, the driving (pun intended) force of the world is crime. The main character, an ex-race car driver, takes on the role of an undercover cop. It seems your superior officer has decided to put your talents to the test. He orders you to infiltrate the local mob group, and to help bring it down from the inside. As a result, the game takes place from the perspective of a low-level gang member. The action speeds into a number of different cities, ranging from San Francisco to Miami. It is on the streets that the main part of the game will take place. 

Basically, Driver is broken into a number of mini-missions. In total, over 30 different challenges await the persistent gamer. The missions are divided between the various locales of the game. The different assignments will each require a special tactic. As an example, consider the mission in which the objective is to destroy an enemy getaway vehicle. In such a situation, the primary goal is to keep an eye on the target and ram it into submission. If the orders are to pick up a gang member within a time limit, speed and secrecy become of utmost importance. If the cops see the exchange, the badges will be on you like glue. Each situation will require a measure of thought and intelligence. 

Driver also offers a couple of extra side games. The survival mode sets the player against a horde of maniacal police officers. The crazed cops will do anything to smash you into submission. The result is a race through the city with a bunch of cops on your tail. It is a test of endurance. In the getaway mode, the idea is to flee for safety from the encroaching stiffs. The game places you in an area of the city, with a cop on your tail. Your only goal is to avoid the authorities. Be careful, though, as the cops may set up a roadblock to impede your progress.

Driver is designed with the Game Boy Color in mind. It offers a password save system to keep your data under wraps.
Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (En,.desc:
在《Driver》中，世界的驅動力（雙關語）是犯罪。主角是一名前賽車手，扮演臥底警察的角色。看來你的上級決定考驗你的才能。他命令你滲透到當地的黑幫組織中，並幫助從內部將其打倒。因此，遊戲是從低級幫派成員的角度進行的。行動加速到許多不同的城市，從舊金山到邁阿密。遊戲的主要部分將在街道上進行。

基本上，Driver 被分為許多小任務。總共有 30 多種不同的挑戰等待著頑強的玩家。任務分為遊戲的各個區域。不同的任務都需要特殊的策略。舉個例子，考慮一下目標是摧毀敵人逃跑車輛的任務。在這種情況下，主要目標是密切關注目標並迫使其屈服。如果命令是在時限內抓捕一名幫派成員，那麼速度和保密就變得至關重要。如果警察看到這種交流，徽章就會像膠水一樣粘在你身上。每種情況都需要一定程度的思考和智慧。

Driver 還提供了一些額外的輔助遊戲。生存模式讓玩家對抗一群瘋狂的警察。瘋狂的警察會想盡辦法讓你屈服。結果就是一場穿越城市的競賽，一群警察緊隨其後。這是對耐力的考驗。在逃跑模式中，我們的想法是逃離入侵的僵硬以尋求安全。遊戲將你置於城市的一個區域，一名警察尾隨著你。你唯一的目標就是躲避當局。不過要小心，因為警察可能會設置路障來阻礙你的前進。

驅動程序的設計考慮了 Game Boy 顏色。它提供了一個密碼保存系統來保護您的數據。

Mission - Impossible (USA) (En,Fr,Es).name: 世嘉土星
Mission - Impossible (USA) (En,Fr,Es).original_desc:
Tie-in of Brian De Palma's popular movie "Mission: Impossible", a side-scrolling action/adventure. Playing the secret agent Ethan Hunt, the player has to fight international terrorists. Assisted by his IMF team, he sneaks into enemy bases, blows up ammunition depots, retrieves stolen information and takes out the terrorists, using high-tech gadgets and weapons.

The game comes with an "Agent Action Kit", a sort of organizer that uses the cartridge's battery backed-up memory to store names and addresses and send messages. This feature is totally unrelated to the game itself.
Mission - Impossible (USA) (En,Fr,Es).desc:
搭配布萊恩·德·帕爾馬的熱門電影《碟中諜》，這是一部橫向捲軸動作/冒險片。玩家扮演特工伊森·亨特，與國際恐怖分子作戰。在國際貨幣基金組織團隊的協助下，他潛入敵方基地，炸毀彈藥庫，取回被盜信息，並使用高科技設備和武器消滅恐怖分子。

該遊戲附帶一個“特工行動套件”，這是一種使用卡帶的電池備份存儲器來存儲姓名和地址並發送消息的組織者。此功能與遊戲本身完全無關。

Harvest Moon GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (G.name: 牧場物語系列
Harvest Moon GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (G.original_desc:
Harvest Moon is a farming simulator/RPG where you must build and maintain a farm during the course of a year, while taking care of your budget and yourself. 

You have the ability to buy, sell and take care of farm animals, crops and any other supplies that you may have. You can trade with many of the town's people, and fellow farmers. If you link up a friend's Game Boy, you can trade items between players as well.

The local stores supply plenty of items to help you in your quest, at a cost, of course. And if you have the time, you can go about the town in search of a little fun away from work.

From an overhead perspective, you can explore your farming area, the local town and the Harvest Sprite tunnels, full of strange and wonderful creatures that can help or destroy your quest. There are four seasons (Summer, Autumn, Winter, Spring) and each brings with it new challenges such as keeping arm animals warm during the colder seasons, and supplying water to the crops during the warmer periods.

The GBC version includes all new characters and background sprites in full color, but is also backwards compatible with the original Game Boy version.
Harvest Moon GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (G.desc:
《Harvest Moon》是一款農業模擬/角色扮演遊戲，您必須在一年的時間內建造和維護農場，同時照顧好您的預算和您自己。

您有能力購買、出售和照顧農場動物、農作物以及您可能擁有的任何其他物資。您可以與鎮上的許多居民和農民同胞進行貿易。如果您連接朋友的 Game Boy，您也可以在玩家之間交易物品。

當地商店提供大量物品來幫助您完成任務，當然需要付費。如果您有時間，您還可以到城裡去尋找工作之餘的一些樂趣。

從俯視角度，你可以探索你的農業區、當地城鎮和收穫精靈隧道，裡面充滿了奇怪而奇妙的生物，它們可以幫助或破壞你的任務。有四個季節（夏季、秋季、冬季、春季），每個季節都會帶來新的挑戰，例如在寒冷的季節為手臂動物保暖，以及在溫暖的季節為農作物供水。

GBC 版本包括所有新角色和全彩背景精靈，但也向後兼容原始 Game Boy 版本。

Batman - Chaos in Gotham (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠:哥譚混亂
Batman - Chaos in Gotham (USA).original_desc: The Batman returns on Game Boy Color with BATMAN: Chaos in Gotham City. Based on the popular animated BATMAN series, this single-player action game allows you to don the cowl of one of two Bat-heroes: Batman or Batgirl. Some of the Dark Knight's famous arch-villains have escaped and are causing serious trouble in Gotham, and it's up to you to put them back where they belong. Everyone from Poison Ivy to the Clown Prince of Crime the Joker himself is here to wreak havoc and keep the caped crusader busy. Grab your utility belt and assault 18 stages of varied action that take you on a tour of Gotham City. Much of the action is played from a side-scrolling perspective, but some levels have you taking out the Batmobile or the Batcycle in overhead high-speed excitement. Naturally, Batman and Batgirl are both packing their usual assortment of weapons and tools including the Batarang, the grappling hook, smoke bombs, and more.
Batman - Chaos in Gotham (USA).desc: 蝙蝠俠在 Game Boy Color 上回歸，推出《蝙蝠俠：哥譚市的混亂》。這款單人動作遊戲以流行的動畫蝙蝠俠系列為基礎，可讓您戴上兩個蝙蝠英雄之一的兜帽：蝙蝠俠或蝙蝠女。黑闇騎士的一些著名大反派已經逃脫，並在哥譚製造了嚴重的麻煩，你需要將他們放回原來的地方。從毒藤女到犯罪王子小丑本人，每個人都在這裡造成嚴重破壞，讓斗篷十字軍忙碌起來。拿起你的實用腰帶，闖入 18 個不同的關卡，帶你游覽哥譚市。大部分動作都是從橫向捲軸的角度進行的，但有些關卡讓你在頭頂上高速駕駛時擊毀蝙蝠車或蝙蝠自行車。當然，蝙蝠俠和蝙蝠女都收拾好了他們常用的各種武器和工具，包括蝙蝠鏢、抓鉤、煙霧彈等等。

Rayman 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Rayman 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).original_desc: Rayman 2 (GBC) is an adaptation of Rayman 2: The Great Escape that was released for the Game Boy Color. Despite the fact that Rayman 2 was a big hit, this game is rarely known about, even to Rayman audiences. It was released under the title Rayman 2: Forever in Europe with slightly different box art. The title screen of this game says Rayman 2: The Great Escape even though the box and the audiences regard it as Rayman 2 (GBC).
Rayman 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).desc: 《雷曼 2》（GBC）是《雷曼 2：大逃亡》的改編版，已在 Game Boy Color 上發布。儘管《雷曼 2》大受歡迎，但這款遊戲卻鮮為人知，甚至對雷曼觀眾來說也是如此。它以《雷曼 2：永遠》為標題在歐洲發行，包裝盒藝術略有不同。該遊戲的標題畫面上寫著《雷曼 2：大逃亡》，儘管盒子和觀眾都將其視為《雷曼 2》（GBC）。

Game & Watch Gallery 2 (USA, Europe) (SG.key: Game & Watch Gallery 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Game & Watch Gallery 2 (USA, Europe) (SG.name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Game & Watch Gallery 2 (USA, Europe) (SG.original_desc:
Game & Watch Gallery 2 features 5 original Game & Watch games from the 1980's plus 5 re-mixed versions in full color featuring a cast of characters from the Mario World (incl. Mario, Peach, Yoshi, Luigi and more). The game included are:

Parachute: Catch the falling characters to gain points.

Helmet: Run around the arena while trying to avoid falling objects.

Chef: Catch falling pieces of food and cook them to feed to customers.

Vermin: Move around the arena and whack the characters to climb out of the holes in the ground.

Donkey Kong: The original Donkey Kong game, where as Mario you must stop Donkey Kong and save the Princess by collecting keys and dodging falling obstacles thrown by Donkey Kong.
Game & Watch Gallery 2 (USA, Europe) (SG.desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journ.key: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journey (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journ.name: 龍鬥士怪獸2 : 科比之旅
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journ.original_desc: Like the original Dragon Warrior Monsters for the Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey combines themes and characters from Enix' long-running Dragon Warriors series with aspects of gameplay established in the amazingly popular Pokémon handheld games. Player take the role of Cobi as he embarks on a new adventure of monster collecting, training, and combat. A concurrently released companion game, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure, follows the similar adventures of Cobi's sister.
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Cobi's Journ.desc:
2022年電子遊戲產業有諸多新作發售。
根據SteamDB統計，2022年全年Steam發佈新遊戲超過一萬二千五百款。

Dragon Warrior I & II (USA) (SGB Enhance.key: Dragon Warrior I & II (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Dragon Warrior I & II (USA) (SGB Enhance.name: 勇者斗恶龙 (游戏)
Dragon Warrior I & II (USA) (SGB Enhance.original_desc:
One of the great traditions in mythology is the story of the lone adventurer conquering evil in the face of seemingly insurmountable odds. The first installment in the Dragon Warrior series throws you into the fray with little more than a horned helmet, the clothes on your back and the generosity of Alefgard's citizens. As you move from town to town, fighting monsters and collecting gold, the details of your mission to defeat the Dragonlord will begin to unfold.

Dragon Warrior II
The second quest takes place many years after the defeat of the Dragonlord. An era of peace and tranquility has been broken by the monstrous armies of Hargon, who invade Moonbrook Castel to assassinate the King. As the Prince of Lorasia, you'll need to travel the countryside in search of like-minded adventurers then set off as a party to stop Hargon from resurrecting an evil entity.
Dragon Warrior I & II (USA) (SGB Enhance.desc:
神話中最偉大的傳統之一是孤獨的冒險家面對看似不可克服的困難戰勝邪惡的故事。在《龍戰士》系列的第一部中，你將帶著角頭盔、背上的衣服和阿雷夫加德公民的慷慨投入戰鬥。當你從一個城鎮移動到另一個城鎮，與怪物戰鬥並收集黃金時，你擊敗龍王的任務細節將開始展開。

龍戰士II
第二個任務發生在龍王被擊敗多年後。哈貢的可怕軍隊打破了和平與安寧的時代，他們入侵月溪城堡刺殺國王。作為洛拉西亞王子，你需要周遊鄉村尋找志同道合的冒險家，然後組隊出發阻止哈貢復活邪惡實體。

Bust-A-Move Millennium (USA, Europe).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Bust-A-Move Millennium (USA, Europe).original_desc:
An exclusive version of the puzzle franchise on the handheld includes all the fun of the original Bust-A-Move along with varying playfield sizes; story, puzzle and versus modes; and the ability to play against a friend in 2 player versus.

Other modes include endless mode (play as long as you want), and a challenge mode where you must complete puzzles perfectly in order to move on.
Bust-A-Move Millennium (USA, Europe).desc:
掌上解謎系列的獨家版本包括原版 Bust-A-Move 的所有樂趣以及不同的遊戲場地大小；故事、謎題和對抗模式；以及與好友進行 2 人對戰的能力。

其他模式包括無盡模式（想玩多久就玩多久）和挑戰模式，在挑戰模式中，你必須完美地完成謎題才能繼續前進。

Mickey's Racing Adventure (USA, Europe).name: Now Production
Mickey's Racing Adventure (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Everyone in Mickey's home town was getting prepared for a big carnival!  Professor Ludwig Von Drake had just finished all the carnival floats and was showing them to Mickey, Minnie, and all their friends.  However, spying from his creepy mansion on the outskirts of town was Big Bad Pete, furious at the group enjoying themselves.  Soon, he'd gathered his cronies and raced into town, swiping all the floats and decorations.  All that was left was a letter challenging them to a race to get their things back.

Mickey's Racing Adventure is an adventure game that centers around isometric racing challenges in various worlds.  It's possible to play as Mickey and his friends, as they explore various parts of Mickey's town, earning money for car upgrades and finding train tokens to travel to different worlds and challenge Pete and his henchmen to various races.  For a fee, Magica de Spell will also conjure up spells for you to use in races and get an edge on your opponents.

The first time you travel to a new world via the train, Casey Jr., you must play a special train mini-game.  Pete has muddled the tracks leading to the worlds, and you must guide Casey Jr. by shifting the track tiles around so that he doesn't hit any dead-ends.  There are also TNT detonators that you must set off by running into them before you can guide Casey Jr. to the exit.

The game also allows you to play as Pluto - while he can't race himself, he can sniff around town and dig for secrets.  He'll also find hidden tunnels which let you play a Digger-like mini-game where you must either collect all the bones underground, or defeat the other dogs in the area by dropping rocks on them.  After completing the objective, Pluto must then head to the exit.

Mickey's Racing Adventure also supports the Game Boy Color's Infra-Red feature by allowing you to send e-mail to your friends via the Infrared Communications port.  Once you unlock the Print Shop, you can also use the Game Boy Printer to print out assorted Disney stickers.
Mickey's Racing Adventure (USA, Europe).desc:
米奇家鄉的每個人都在為一場盛大的狂歡節做準備！路德維希·馮·德雷克教授剛剛完成了所有嘉年華花車，並將它們展示給米奇、米妮和他們所有的朋友。然而，大壞皮特在他位於城郊的令人毛骨悚然的豪宅里進行監視，他對這群人的享樂感到憤怒。很快，他就召集了自己的親信，衝進城裡，搶走了所有的花車和裝飾品。剩下的只是一封信，挑戰他們參加一場比賽，奪回他們的東西。

米奇賽車冒險是一款以不同世界中的等距賽車挑戰為中心的冒險遊戲。玩家可以扮演米奇和他的朋友們，探索米奇小鎮的各個地方，賺取金錢來升級汽車，尋找火車代幣前往不同的世界，並在各種比賽中挑戰皮特和他的追隨者。只需付費，Magica de Spell 還可以變出咒語供您在比賽中使用，並在對手中獲得優勢。

小凱西，第一次乘坐火車前往新世界時，必須玩一個特殊的火車小遊戲。皮特弄亂了通往世界的軌道，你必須通過移動軌道瓷磚來引導小凱西，這樣他就不會遇到任何死胡同。還有 TNT 雷管，您必須撞上它們才能引爆，然後才能引導小凱西到達出口。

遊戲還允許你扮演普魯托——雖然他不能自己比賽，但他可以在城鎮中嗅探並挖掘秘密。他還會發現隱藏的隧道，讓你玩一個類似挖掘機的迷你游戲，你必須收集地下所有的骨頭，或者通過向該地區的其他狗扔石頭來擊敗它們。完成目標後，普路托必須前往出口。

米奇賽車冒險還支持 Game Boy Color 的紅外線功能，允許您通過紅外線通信端口向您的朋友發送電子郵件。解鎖打印店後，您還可以使用 Game Boy 打印機打印各種迪士尼貼紙。

Game & Watch Gallery 3 (USA, Europe) (SG.key: Game & Watch Gallery 3 (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Game & Watch Gallery 3 (USA, Europe) (SG.name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Game & Watch Gallery 3 (USA, Europe) (SG.original_desc: This is the third installment of software that lets you play the old-fashioned "Game & Watch". This title includes games such as "Donkey Kong JR. There is also an arrangement mode.
Game & Watch Gallery 3 (USA, Europe) (SG.desc: 這是軟件的第三部分，可讓您玩老式的“遊戲和觀看”。該遊戲包括《Donkey Kong JR》等遊戲。還有排列模式。

Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors.key: Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors (USA)
Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors.original_name: Dragon Ball Z : Legendary Super Warriors
Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors.name: PlayStation 3遊戲列表
Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors.original_desc: Dragon Ball Z: Legendary Super Warriors is a mixture of a card game and a turn-based fighting game for the Game Boy Color. The game is played with original in-game cards for attacks, techniques and support items and initially has only two modes trade and story. Legendary Super Warriorsâ€™ story spans from the Saiyan saga to the end of the Buu Saga. Once beaten, a battle mode is unlocked, allowing players to square off with random enemies. Once the game is beaten, any character is usable in any battle, such as Frieza vs. Cell.
Dragon Ball Z - Legendary Super Warriors.desc: 《龍珠 Z：傳奇超級戰士》是 Game Boy Color 的卡牌遊戲和回合製格鬥遊戲的混合體。該遊戲使用原創的遊戲卡牌進行攻擊、技術和支持物品，最初只有交易和故事兩種模式。傳奇超級戰士的故事從賽亞人傳奇一直延伸到佈歐傳奇的終結。一旦被擊敗，戰鬥模式就會解鎖，玩家可以與隨機的敵人對戰。一旦遊戲通關，任何角色都可以在任何戰鬥中使用，例如弗利薩對戰沙魯。

Toki Tori (USA, Europe) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es).name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Toki Tori (USA, Europe) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es).original_desc:
Just hatched from its shell, Toki Tori finds that his fellow chicks have been kidnapped. Lucky for him that even at a young age, he has plenty of skills up his sleeve, so he sets out to find his family and why they were taken in the first place.

A cross between a puzzle and an action title, you must use the skills available to you to advance through 60 levels, seperated into 4 worlds of 15 levels. Skills include building ladders to cross gaps that your jump can't make, warping to other areas of the level or building gaps for enemies to fall through.
Toki Tori (USA, Europe) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es).desc:
剛從殼裡孵出來的託基·托里發現他的小雞同伴被綁架了。對他來說幸運的是，即使在年輕的時候，他也有很多技能，所以他開始尋找他的家人以及他們最初為什麼被帶走。

這是一款益智遊戲和動作遊戲的結合體，您必須使用可用的技能來闖過 60 個關卡，這些關卡分為 4 個世界，每個世界有 15 個關卡。技能包括建造梯子來跨越你跳躍無法跨越的間隙、扭曲到關卡的其他區域或建造間隙讓敵人掉下來。

Bomberman Quest (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB.name: PlayStation游戏列表
Bomberman Quest (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB.original_desc:
Carrying with him all the monsters he captured on his last mission, Bomberman is headed for his home planet Bomber. However, all of a sudden someone steals all of his four rocket engines and he is forced to make an emergency landing. After having woken up from the crash he realises that not only are his engines gone, but all of the monsters have escaped!

Bomberman Quest is a top down action RPG in which Bomberman has to traverse four different lands and speak to the natives to aid him in his quest to reclaim the engines and monsters. In true action RPG fashion, you pick up upgrades along the way, such as bomb parts and skills acquired from defeating monsters.

There is also a battle mode where two players can duke it out via linked Game Boy Colors.
Bomberman Quest (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB.desc:
炸彈人帶著他在上次任務中捕獲的所有怪物，前往他的家鄉轟炸機星球。然而，突然有人偷走了他所有的四個火箭發動機，他被迫緊急迫降。從車禍中醒來後，他發現不僅他的引擎不見了，而且所有的怪物都逃走了！

Bomberman Quest 是一款自上而下的動作角色扮演遊戲，其中 Bomberman 必須穿越四個不同的土地並與當地人交談，以幫助他奪回引擎和怪物。在真正的動作角色扮演遊戲中，你會一路升級，例如炸彈零件和擊敗怪物獲得的技能。

還有一種戰鬥模式，兩名玩家可以通過鏈接的 Game Boy Colors 進行決鬥。

Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.key: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Pt,Sv,Da)
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.original_name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.name: 魯伯·葛林特
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.original_desc:
To unravel the mystery of the Chamber of Secrets, young wizard Harry Potter must fight turn-based battles and solve quests. 
In this game, he is not alone, as a party system was added: his friends Ron and Hermione will join Harry in the battles. While Harry can use card combinations of Famous Witches and Wizards cards to produce special attacks and effects, his friends have other means: Ron can unleash his rat Scabbers in special rat attacks and Hermione, being the know-it-all that she is, influences combat through "lecture attacks", using helpful hints like "Be Careful!" (which increases defense, for example).
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.desc:
為了解開密室的謎團，年輕的巫師哈利·波特必須進行回合製戰鬥並解決任務。
在這款遊戲中，他並不孤單，因為添加了隊伍系統：他的朋友羅恩和赫敏將與哈利一起戰鬥。雖然哈利可以使用著名女巫和巫師卡牌的組合來產生特殊攻擊和效果，但他的朋友們還有其他方法：羅恩可以在特殊的老鼠攻擊中釋放他的老鼠斑斑，而赫敏作為萬事通，可以通過“演講攻擊”影響戰鬥，使用諸如“小心！”之類的有用提示。（例如，增加防禦力）。

Mega Man Xtreme 2 (USA, Europe).name: Greatest Hits
Mega Man Xtreme 2 (USA, Europe).original_desc:
A new threat is arising! Reploids are suddenly breaking down, and when their bodies are investigated, no traces of their "souls" can be found in their memory! No one knows how it is happening, and the Reploid world is in a panic. To make matters worse, several Mavericks from the past are rampaging again, only this time with a new, deadly "DNA Soul" chip installed in them, making them even deadlier than before! The only hope left is in the Maverick Hunters, and their greatest heroes, X and Zero, to get to the bottom of this incident.

It's up to you to guide X and Zero through this deadly new mission and find out who is behind this Soul Eraser terror!
Mega Man Xtreme 2 (USA, Europe).desc:
新的威脅正在出現！複製體突然崩潰了，當調查他們的身體時，他們的記憶中找不到他們“靈魂”的痕跡！沒有人知道這是怎麼發生的，機器人世界陷入了恐慌。更糟糕的是，昔日的幾隻小牛再次橫行，只不過這一次他們身上安裝了全新的致命“DNA靈魂”芯片，比之前更加致命！剩下的唯一希望就是特立獨行的獵人和他們最偉大的英雄 X 和零，來查明這一事件的真相。

你需要引導 X 和零完成這個致命的新任務，並查明誰是靈魂抹殺恐怖分子的幕後黑手！

Mobile Golf (Japan) (Translated).name: The Best
Mobile Golf (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In 2001, Nintendo and Camelot released a Japan-only sequel for Mario Golf (GBC) called Mobile Golf.

It can be considered an expansion: the same game engine but with new courses, new golfers, new minigames and even an exclusive mini-golf mode that never appeared again in the series. It lacks a story mode, but all RPG elements (experience, leveling up, skill points...) for character building are still there.

But what it made it so special was its Mobile Adapter compatibility, a special link cable that allowed internet connection through a cellphone. This allowed for massive multiplayer tournaments to be held, where participants could get amazing prizes like special clubs for use in-game and even extra courses and characters that could be considered DLC somehow.

There is now a fan translation patch which also changes the way DLC is unlocked in-game, so you can unlock them (courses, characters, minigames and clubs) by playing the single-player modes.
Mobile Golf (Japan) (Translated).desc:
2001 年，任天堂和 Camelot 發布了僅在日本發售的《馬里奧高爾夫》(GBC) 續作，名為《Mobile Golf》。

它可以被認為是一個擴展：相同的遊戲引擎，但有新的球場、新的高爾夫球手、新的迷你游戲，甚至是該系列中從未出現過的獨家迷你高爾夫模式。它缺少故事模式，但用於角色塑造的所有 RPG 元素（經驗、升級、技能點......）仍然存在。

但它的特別之處在於它的移動適配器兼容性，這是一種特殊的連接電纜，允許通過手機連接互聯網。這使得大型多人錦標賽得以舉行，參與者可以獲得驚人的獎品，例如在遊戲中使用的特殊俱樂部，甚至可以被視為 DLC 的額外課程和角色。

現在有一個粉絲翻譯補丁，它還改變了遊戲中 DLC 的解鎖方式，因此您可以通過玩單人模式來解鎖它們（課程、角色、迷你游戲和俱樂部）。

Pocket Bomberman (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.name: Dreamcast
Pocket Bomberman (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.original_desc:
Long, long ago, the sun was covered by a dark and heavy cloud. It was said this cloud was caused by a monster that had sealed the Sword of the Sun. Legends also says that to break the seal, a hero must collect five Power Stones that are guarded by monsters. Bomberman takes up the challenge as he is the last hero strong enough to defeat such monsters.

This is a side-scrolling platform game. In each world, you must clear four areas by killing any monsters within. To kill a monster, you drop a bomb. After a few seconds, the bomb explodes in a four-way blast. If the monster is within range of the blast, it is killed. After you clear these four areas, you must clear a fifth area by killing a boss to clear the world and collect its Power Stone.

Be careful, though, because if Bomberman is touched by a monster, touches a dangerous item or is caught in the blast of his own bomb, you lose a life. After all lives are gone, you get the option to restart that last area or quit. In most areas, you can, though the placement of bombs, find items to increase your jumping, speed, blast radius, etc.
Pocket Bomberman (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.desc:
林書豪（英語：Jeremy Shu-How Lin，1988年8月23日—）為美國前籃球運動員，場上位置為控球後衛。
林書豪在舊金山灣區長大，高中時獲得北加州年度最佳球員殊榮。在沒有任何大學提供體育獎學金的情況下選擇就讀哈佛大學，於大學四年間三次入選常春藤盟校年度隊伍。林書豪一開始進入國家籃球協會（NBA）並不順利，在NBA選秀會上落選，2010年與家鄉球隊金州勇士簽約，但菜鳥年只有零星上場機會，三次被下放至發展聯盟。2011-12賽季開打前遭金州勇士和休士頓火箭釋出，之後加入紐約尼克。於紐約尼克初期未有上場機會而待在發展聯盟，直到2012年2月林書豪意外帶領紐約尼克創下七連勝、成為球隊先發陣容，期間的表現不僅幫助紐約尼克進入季後賽，也使林書豪一夕成名、風靡全球，掀起一陣「林來瘋」熱潮，並被《時代雜誌》列為2012年百大最具影響力人物。
林書豪接著效力過休士頓火箭、洛杉磯湖人、夏洛特黃蜂、布魯克林籃網和亞特蘭大老鷹，2019年隨著多倫多暴龍奪下NBA總冠軍，之後離開NBA舞臺轉戰中國男子籃球職業聯賽（CBA）北京首鋼、NBA G聯盟聖克魯斯勇士、CBA廣州龍獅與P. LEAGUE+（PLG）高雄17直播鋼鐵人，2023年加盟PLG新北國王與弟弟林書緯當隊友，2024年林書豪奪下PLG總冠軍，2025年斬獲台灣職業籃球大聯盟（TPBL）總冠軍與總冠軍賽MVP，同時在例行賽抱走年度MVP、年度第一隊與年度防守第一隊殊榮，同年8月底宣布退休。

Pokemon Trading Card Game (USA, Australi.key: Pokemon Trading Card Game (USA, Australia) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Pokemon Trading Card Game (USA, Australi.name: 2024年遊戲大獎
Pokemon Trading Card Game (USA, Australi.original_desc: The greatest Pokemon Trading Card Game players of all time - the Grand Masters - are looking for one player worthy of inheriting the four rare, Legendary Pokemon Cards!  Build new decks with the Auto Deck Machine, hone your skills on the Challenge Machine and test your ability in Challenge Hall.  Expand your card collection, duel your way through 8 Club Masters and earn the right to challenge the Grand Masters in the Pokemon Dome!  Shadowy figures, wise instructors and powerful opnnents await in the ultimate trading card game adventure.
Pokemon Trading Card Game (USA, Australi.desc: 有史以來最偉大的口袋妖怪集換式卡牌遊戲玩家 - 大師 - 正在尋找一位值得繼承四張稀有傳奇口袋妖怪卡的玩家！使用自動套牌機構建新套牌，在挑戰機上磨練您的技能，並在挑戰大廳中測試您的能力。擴大你的卡牌收藏，通過 8 位俱樂部大師進行決鬥，並獲得挑戰 Pokemon Dome 大師的權利！神秘的人物、睿智的導師和強大的對手在終極集換式卡牌遊戲冒險中等待著您。

Mario Tennis (USA).name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Mario Tennis (USA).original_desc:
Mario Tennis for the Game Boy Color is a much different experience than its N64 effort. In addition to the core gameplay found in the N64 version, the GBC version features an RPG-style world that allows you to work your way up through the ranks at the Royal Tennis Academy.

The main mode, Mario Tour, has you starting off as a Rookie with low stats. By completing training programs and defeating other students, you're able to gain experience points, which allow you to boost your tennis stats. When you're not playing tennis, you can spend time wandering the Academy grounds: talking to other students, or just taking in the sights and sounds.

In addition to the main game, there's also an exhibition mode (singles or doubles) for quick-play. And, if you get tired of playing the computer, the game supports the Game Link Cable for play against a friend.
Mario Tennis (USA).desc:
Game Boy Color 的《馬里奧網球》與 N64 的體驗截然不同。除了 N64 版本中的核心遊戲玩法外，GBC 版本還具有 RPG 風格的世界，可讓您在皇家網球學院的排名中不斷提升。

主要模式“馬里奧之旅”讓您從一個低統計數據的新秀開始。通過完成訓練計劃並擊敗其他學生，您可以獲得經驗值，從而提高您的網球統計數據。當您不打網球時，您可以花時間在學院場地上漫步：與其他學生交談，或者只是欣賞風景和聲音。

除了主遊戲外，還有用於快速遊戲的表演賽模式（單打或雙打）。而且，如果您厭倦了玩電腦，遊戲還支持 Game Link 電纜與朋友一起玩。

R-Type DX (USA, Europe) (GB Compatible).name: R-Type DX
R-Type DX (USA, Europe) (GB Compatible).original_desc: The World Government needs your help. A deep-space probe has uncovered the Bydo Empire's secret plans to mount an attack on Earth. A full-scale assault force would be detected by the Empire's long-range scanners, and any hope of surprise would be lost. Our only chance is for a single pilot in a lone R-Type fighter to penetrate the Bydo defense system and destroy the evil Empire before it can launch its attack. Tear through Bydo defenses as you blast enemies with your Fire Chain, Super Laser and Bubble Beam. Take the fight to a fevered pitch with two pulse-pounding rapid-fire modes on your Game Boy Color system.
R-Type DX (USA, Europe) (GB Compatible).desc:
SpaceX星艦（英語：SpaceX Starship，亦譯作「星舟」），是由太空科技探索公司（SpaceX）開發的一種可完全複用的重型運載火箭，於2017年9月伊隆·馬斯克首次公布。星艦投入使用後將取代獵鷹9號、獵鷹重型火箭以及飛龍號太空船等載具，執行近地軌道、地球同步軌道上的任務。除了近地軌道，星艦在軌道上加注燃料後，也可以完成地月轉移以及登陸火星的任務。
SpaceX在2012年左右開始研發火星殖民系統（MCT，即星艦前身），火箭使用的猛禽火箭發動機則在2016年開始測試。SpaceX在2018年3月開始製造BFR的首個火箭原型，隨後伊隆·馬斯克在一場發表會上宣佈了BFR的後續計畫。在發表會上馬斯克重新命名了BFR，他將第一級推進器稱為SpaceX超級重型（Super Heavy），將第二級飛船稱為SpaceX星艦飛船（Starship (spacecraft)）。SpaceX同時表示其最初期望是在2022年發射載貨版星艦去火星，然後在2024年執行載人計畫。計畫中包含了可重複使用的運載火箭以及用於支持火箭快速發射、復用的地面基礎設施，SpaceX還會研發可以在近地軌道進行在軌加注燃料的技術。作為超重型運載火箭，星艦的近地軌道回收運力可高達150公噸（330,000磅），全消耗運力高達200公噸（440,000磅）。2023年4月的SpaceX第一次星艦軌道試飛任務，使星艦超越太空發射系統，成為起飛推力最大的運載火箭，未來還將奪得土星5號最大運載能力火箭的頭銜。
這一概念名稱的演變順序為：重型運載火箭概念（BFR）2005年→火星殖民運輸器（MCT）2013年→行星際運輸系統（ITS）2016年→大獵鷹火箭（BFR）2017年→星艦（Starship）2018年
如今，SpaceX正在採用不鏽鋼來建造用於測試的一系列星艦原型，因為不鏽鋼的廉價與加工的便捷性，原型的建造變得十分迅速。SpaceX希望為原型搭建專門的生產流水線，這使得SpaceX可以在更高的頻率下進行火箭測試並快速地從中發現問題，隨後SpaceX就可以針對該問題迅速地做出改進。

Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (U.key: Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (USA, Australia)
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (U.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : Oracle of Ages
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (U.name: 薩爾達傳說系列世界觀
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (U.original_desc: Using the legendary power of the Triforce, Link travels to a distant land known as Labrynna where Veran, the Sorceress of Shadows, has developed a scheme to alter Labrynna's past. Through trickery and deceit, Veran harnesses the power of Nayru, the Oracle of Ages, and travels 400 years into the past. Before the Sorceress of Shadows can complete her dark mission, Link must use the Harp of Ages to save the day.
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Ages (U.desc: 林克利用三角力量的傳奇力量，前往一個名為拉布瑞納的遙遠之地，暗影女巫維蘭制定了一項計劃來改變拉布瑞納的過去。通過詭計和欺騙，維蘭利用了萬古神諭奈魯的力量，穿越到了 400 年前。在暗影女巫完成她的黑暗使命之前，林克必須使用時代豎琴來拯救世界。

Wario Land 3 (World) (En,Ja).name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Wario Land 3 (World) (En,Ja).original_desc:
During a joyride in his biplane, the engine blows and Wario crashes into the woods. It's here where he finds a hidden cave with a magic Music box. Before he can say "I hate Mario", the box pulls him inside and into a room with a dark figure, who strikes a deal with him. Find all of the missing Music boxes and he can leave. And any treasure he finds he can keep. 

Much like Wario Land 2, Wario can't die from any attacks by the enemy. However he can change form after certain attacks, which can both help and halt his progress in each level. New forms of Wario include Invisible Wario and Ball of Yarn Wario (an un-controllable ball of yarn, with Wario inside).

Also, basic attacks such as swimming and the butt stomp don't become available to Wario until after completing a certain amount of levels, meaning you have to go back to completed levels to access other areas full of loot.
Wario Land 3 (World) (En,Ja).desc:
瓦里奧在乘坐雙翼飛機兜風時，引擎爆炸，墜入樹林。在這裡，他發現了一個隱藏的洞穴，裡面有一個神奇的音樂盒。在他說出“我討厭馬里奧”之前，盒子把他拉了進去，進入一個有一個黑暗人物的房間，這個人物與他達成了一項協議。找到所有丟失的音樂盒，他就可以離開了。他可以保留他發現的任何寶藏。

就像《瓦里奧大陸 2》一樣，瓦里奧不會因敵人的任何攻擊而死亡。然而，他可以在某些攻擊後改變形態，這既可以幫助也可以阻止他在每個級別的進步。新形式的瓦里奧包括隱形瓦里奧和紗球瓦里奧（一種無法控制的紗球，裡面有瓦里奧）。

此外，瓦里奧只有在完成一定數量的關卡後才能使用游泳和踩屁股等基本攻擊，這意味著你必須返回已完成的關卡才能進入充滿戰利品的其他區域。

Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.key: Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.original_desc:
Seeking revenge on Wario after he stole their treasure in Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3, special agents from the Black Sugar Gang of Kitchen Island sneak into Wario's newly built castle, steal back the treasure, and leave the castle and the surrounding area a mess. As Wario, you must clean the place up and take back what you now call your own.

In a change from the original Wario Land, Wario is now immortal, to a certain point. Instead of dying when hit by an enemy, Wario loses the coins he collected along his travels in each level. And he can also turn into other Warios. For example, if he is hit by a bee, Wario puffs up into a giant ball of air, and floats up to the top of the level. Only when hit by a sharp object will he return to normal. There are other types, like Fire Wario and Zombie Wario, and each can have its advantages, like getting to other areas otherwise unreachable, or they can halt your progress.
Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.desc:
廚房島黑糖幫的特工在《瓦里奧樂園：超級馬里奧樂園3》中偷走了瓦里奧的寶藏後，為了向瓦里奧報仇，潛入瓦里奧新建的城堡，偷回寶藏，讓城堡和周邊地區一片狼藉。作為瓦里奧，你必須清理這個地方並奪回你現在所謂的自己的東西。

與最初的瓦里奧大陸相比，瓦里奧現在在某種程度上是不朽的。瓦里奧並沒有在被敵人擊中時死亡，而是失去了他在每個關卡中收集的硬幣。而且他還可以變成其他瓦里奧。例如，如果他被蜜蜂擊中，瓦里奧就會膨脹成一個巨大的氣球，並漂浮到水平的頂部。只有被尖銳物體擊中，他才會恢復正常。還有其他類型，例如火焰瓦里奧和殭屍瓦里奧，每種類型都有其優勢，例如到達其他無法到達的區域，或者它們可能會阻止您的進度。

Hands of Time (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es.name: 最後生還者
Hands of Time (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es.original_desc:
As the young Sebastian, gamers take the role of the son of a brilliant scientist who has discovered a means to travel through time. Time travel has already taken place in this reality, however, and Sebatian's first mission is to use his father's discovery to return to the past and destroy an earlier time machine, which upset the balance of power in a past war and led to dangerous realities in their present. Just as Sebastian enters the machine to travel back to the past, he watches helplessly as his father is kidnapped and taken prisoner.

You play as Sebastian, the soldier sent back in time to rectify the present. Hands of Time features an overhead view and six levels, each of which is comprised of a small overworld with various objectives. Much of the game requires completing item-swapping sequences in order to progress, while avoiding enemy soldiers along the way. You have a small pistol with infinite ammo. You can collect better weapons, though their ammo is limited. There are no difficulty levels and no multiplayer; you can jump to any of the six levels by use of a password system.
Hands of Time (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es.desc:
玩家扮演年輕的塞巴斯蒂安，扮演一位傑出科學家的兒子，他發現了穿越時空的方法。然而，時間旅行已經在這個現實中發生了，塞巴蒂安的第一個任務是利用他父親的發現回到過去並摧毀一台更早的時間機器，這打破了過去戰爭中的力量平衡，並導致了現在的危險現實。當塞巴斯蒂安進入機器回到過去時，他無助地看著他的父親被綁架並被俘虜。

你扮演塞巴斯蒂安，一名被送回過去糾正現在的士兵。《時間之手》具有俯視圖和六個關卡，每個關卡都由一個具有各種目標的小型主世界組成。遊戲的大部分內容都需要完成物品交換序列才能前進，同時還要避開沿途的敵方士兵。你有一把帶有無限彈藥的小手槍。你可以收集更好的武器，儘管它們的彈藥有限。沒有難度級別，也沒有多人遊戲；您可以使用密碼系統跳轉到六個級別中的任何一個。

Tomb Raider (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,I.name: 2024年電子遊戲界
Tomb Raider (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,I.original_desc:
Deep in the jungles of Peru, hidden in a lost temple is the Nightmare Stone, an ancient and magical crystal. In the wrong hands it has the power to destroy the world!

Lara Croft must find the deadly crystal before anyone else, but first she must jump, climb, swim and blast her way through temples, tombs and treasure rooms, facing skeletons, giant snakes and evil spirits in her most action-packed adventure yet!
Tomb Raider (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,I.desc:
在秘魯叢林深處，一座失落的神廟中隱藏著夢魘石，這是一種古老而神奇的水晶。如果落入壞人之手，它就有毀滅世界的力量！

勞拉·克勞馥 (Lara Croft) 必須先於其他人找到致命的水晶，但首先她必須跳躍、攀爬、游泳並爆破穿過神廟、墳墓和寶藏室，在她迄今為止最精彩的冒險中面對骷髏、巨蛇和惡靈！

Wacky Races (USA) (En,Fr,Es).name: 卡通頻道 (日本)
Wacky Races (USA) (En,Fr,Es).original_desc: For those who can remember the cartoon series, this will be a blast from the past. Choose from all your favourite characters including Peter Perfect, Penelope Pitstop and, of course, Dick Dastardly and Muttley, and wind your way through cartoon like environments in the familiar vehicles of each character. Simply get to the end of the race first to open up new tracks, and use weapons to pick off the rest of the cast, and aid your progress.
Wacky Races (USA) (En,Fr,Es).desc: 對於那些還記得這部卡通系列的人來說，這將是過去的一次爆炸。從所有你最喜歡的角色中進行選擇，包括 Peter Perfect、Penelope Pitstop，當然還有 Dick Dastardly 和 Muttley，並乘坐每個角色熟悉的車輛穿過卡通般的環境。只需先到達比賽終點即可開闢新賽道，並使用武器幹掉其餘的演員，並幫助您取得進展。

John Romero's Daikatana (Europe) (En,Fr,.name: 約翰·羅梅羅的大刀
John Romero's Daikatana (Europe) (En,Fr,.original_desc: In 2455 AD, Kage Mishima used the magical powers of Daikatana, the most powerful sword ever forged, to alter time and establish himself as supreme dictator. The player assumes the role of Hiro Miyamoto, a student in the art of Japanese war and one of the few people on Earth who knows what happened. Now it is Hiro's duty to use the Daikatana's power and travel back in time to correct history.
John Romero's Daikatana (Europe) (En,Fr,.desc: 公元 2455 年，三島影使用有史以來最強大的劍——大刀的神奇力量來改變時間，確立了自己的最高獨裁者地位。玩家扮演宮本浩（Hiro Miyamoto）的角色，他是一名日本戰爭藝術的學生，也是地球上為數不多的知道發生了什麼的人之一。現在，宏的職責是利用大刀的力量並回到過去糾正歷史。

Super Robot Pinball (Japan) (Translated).name: 傳送門2
Super Robot Pinball (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: As many as 40 different types of robots, including Mazinger Z and Gundam, are active in the game. When enemies appear, summon allied robots and use powerful techniques such as special attacks and mental commands to defeat them.
Super Robot Pinball (Japan) (Translated).desc: 遊戲中活躍著包括 Mazinger Z 和 Gundam 在內的多達 40 種不同類型的機器人。當敵人出現時，召喚盟友機器人並使用特殊攻擊和精神命令等強大技術來擊敗他們。

Donald Duck - Quack Attack (Europe) (En,.name: PlayStation游戏列表
Donald Duck - Quack Attack (Europe) (En,.original_desc:
You play as Donald in this 3D platform action game. Donald's girlfriend, Daisy is a reporter for a television station in Duckberg. While doing a story on the secret temple of the terrible magician Merlock, Daisy is kidnapped. Now, it is up to Donald to get her back. Along the way he will have help from his nephews, Huey, Dewey, and Louie, and the inventor Gyro Gearloose. He will also have competition from Gladstone Gander, who is also trying to save Daisy. 

Game play alternates between side-scrolling running and jumping and 3D running and jumping. The side-scrolling levels play a lot like the Super Mario Bros. games. The 3D levels are more akin to the Crash Bandicoot series of games. All in all, there are 20 levels spread out through various areas.
Donald Duck - Quack Attack (Europe) (En,.desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Turok 3 - Shadow of Oblivion (USA, Europ.name: PlayStation 3遊戲列表
Turok 3 - Shadow of Oblivion (USA, Europ.original_desc:
In Turok 2 when Primagen's Lightship was destroyed, the explosion created a shockwave through out the universe. This effect nearly ends the life of Oblivion, a 'thing' the drifts through space, consuming anything that ends up in its way. Also during this explosion, a new world was created. In this world lies the Turok family tree, and Oblivion knows that the only way the pain the lies within can be stopped, is to destroy the Turok line. 

The third title in the Turok series adds two characters to play instead of one, new weapons (as well as some old favourites) and a highly detailed soundtracks with cut-scenes detailing the storyline as you go along.
Turok 3 - Shadow of Oblivion (USA, Europ.desc:
在《圖洛克 2》中，當 Primagen 的光船被摧毀時，爆炸在整個宇宙中產生了衝擊波。這種效應幾乎結束了湮滅的生命，它是一種在太空中漂流的“東西”，吞噬一切擋在它路上的東西。也在這次爆炸中，創造了一個新的世界。在這個世界上存在著圖羅克的家譜，而湮滅知道，唯一能夠阻止其中的痛苦的方法就是摧毀圖羅克的血統。

《Turok》系列的第三部作品增加了兩個角色（而不是一個）、新武器（以及一些舊的最愛）和高度詳細的配樂，以及詳細介紹故事情節的過場動畫。

Mickey's Speedway USA (USA, Europe) (En,.name: Rare
Mickey's Speedway USA (USA, Europe) (En,.original_desc:
The Weasels have kidnapped Mickey Mouse's dog!  All that was left was a ransom note with a picture of Pluto being hauled away in a van, and some scrawled writing taunting Mickey to try and catch them.  Not knowing what else to do, Mickey called up his friends, who all volunteered to help - even Big Bad Pete plans to race!  You'll have to speed across the country to catch up with the weasels and rescue Pluto!

Mickey's Speedway USA is an isometric racing game that uses the same engine as Mickey's Racing Adventure.  Players can choose from Mickey, Minnie, Donald, Daisy, Goofy or Pete (and some secret characters too) as they race around various famous cities and landmarks from the United States, including Los Angeles, the Grand Canyon, San Francisco, Montana, and Yellowstone, just to name a few.

The Adventure Mode of the game plays out Grand Prix style.  You must complete four races in each world, and at the end of each race, you're given points based on your placing.  The player with the most points at the end of the four races wins the trophy for that circuit.  There are assorted power-ups that help you as you race, including the Baseball Chucker (a projectile), the Magno Flyer (a homing missile), the Carbo Spritzer (a turbo), and the Paint Splotcher (an oil slick).

There is also a Time Trial mode which lets you race any track that you've previously unlocked - while you can use it to practice tracks, the goal is to race fast enough to beat the track's lap time and earn a gold star in every race.  Another mode is Professor Von Drake's 'Driving School'.  In this mode, you must complete specific tasks given to you, such as parking, reverse parking and slalom driving.  The faster you perform these tasks, the better ranking you will receive (again, with a gold star as your ultimate goal).  However, you will receive a time penalty if you hit a cone or wall, or miss your parking spot, so accuracy counts as well.

Mickey's Speedway USA supports many of the Game Boy Color's functions - you can play a two-player link cable race, transfer data from Mickey's Racing Adventure via the IR Link to unlock a secret, and connect to the Nintendo 64 version of Mickey's Speedway USA using the Transfer Pak.  As you progress through the game, you'll unlock many postcards and pictures for your album, which can be printed out via the Game Boy Printer.
Mickey's Speedway USA (USA, Europe) (En,.desc:
黃鼠狼綁架了米老鼠的狗！剩下的只是一張贖金信，上面有一張普魯托被一輛貨車拖走的照片，還有一些潦草的字跡，嘲笑米奇試圖抓住他們。米奇不知道還能做什麼，於是給他的朋友們打電話，他們都自願提供幫助——就連大壞皮特也計劃參加比賽！你必須加速穿越整個國家才能追上黃鼠狼並拯救冥王星！

米奇賽車場美國是一款等距賽車遊戲，使用與米奇賽車冒險相同的引擎。玩家可以選擇米奇、米妮、唐老鴨、黛西、高飛或皮特（還有一些秘密角色），在美國各個著名城市和地標性建築之間比賽，包括洛杉磯、大峽谷、舊金山、蒙大拿州和黃石公園等。

遊戲的冒險模式呈現大獎賽風格。您必須在每個世界中完成四場比賽，並且在每場比賽結束時，您都會根據您的排名獲得積分。在四場比賽結束時得分最高的選手將贏得該賽道的獎杯。有各種各樣的能量道具可以在比賽時為您提供幫助，包括棒球查克（一種射彈）、Magno Flyer（一種尋的導彈）、Carbo Spritzer（一種渦輪）和 Paint Splotcher（一種浮油）。

還有計時賽模式，可讓您在之前解鎖的任何賽道上比賽 - 雖然您可以用它來練習賽道，但目標是跑得足夠快，以打破賽道的單圈時間，並在每場比賽中贏得金星。另一種模式是馮·德雷克教授的“駕駛學校”。在這種模式下，你必須完成給你的特定任務，例如停車、倒車停車和繞樁駕駛。您執行這些任務的速度越快，您獲得的排名就越高（同樣，以金星作為您的最終目標）。但是，如果您撞到圓錐體或牆壁，或者錯過停車位，您將受到時間處罰，因此準確性也很重要。

Mickey's Speedway USA 支持許多 Game Boy Color 的功能 - 您可以玩兩人鏈接電纜比賽、通過 IR Link 傳輸來自 Mickey's Racing Adventure 的數據以解鎖秘密，以及使用 Transfer Pak 連接到 Nintendo 64 版本的 Mickey's Speedway USA。隨著遊戲的進展，您將解鎖相冊中的許多明信片和圖片，這些明信片和圖片可以通過 Game Boy 打印機打印出來。

Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.key: Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening DX (USA, Europe) (Rev 2) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : Link's Awakening DX
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.name: 加儂
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.original_desc: Link's latest challenge is set on the mysterious Koholint, a place where dreams and reality collide. As a castaway, Link must find a way to escape from the island and return to his beloved homeland of Hyrule. This will not be an easy task.rnrnThe island's inhabitants have no knowledge of the outside world. One creature, a talking owl, may know the solution to Link's dilemma. Link must first tackle eight dungeons full of treacherous monsters and tricky traps. His goal: find the eight instruments of the Sirens and awaken the omnipotent Wind Fish which rules the island.
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Croc 2 (USA, Europe).name: Greatest Hits
Croc 2 (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Croc is on a quest to find his parents. However, Baron Dante has kidnapped the Gobbos kings. Croc then turns his attention to rescue all of the Gobbos kings.

You travel across 48 levels in this free roaming 3D game. You have to beat all the levels in a village (except the secret level) to move on to the next one. In each village, (except the 4th village) are 5 regular levels, 2 bosses, and 1 secret level. Regular levels are levels where you just beat them and get certain items in them.

Bosses are levels where you go through one section then fight a monster at the end. Secret levels are levels where you collect the jigsaw piece. Once you collect the jigsaw piece in all 4 secret levels and defeat Baron Dante, Swap Meet Pete will take you to the lost levels.
Croc 2 (USA, Europe).desc:
鱷魚正在尋找他的父母。然而，但丁男爵綁架了戈布斯國王。鱷魚隨後將注意力轉向營救所有戈布斯國王。

在這款免費漫遊 3D 遊戲中，您將穿越 48 個關卡。你必須通過村莊中的所有關卡（秘密關卡除外）才能進入下一關。每個村莊（除了第 4 個村莊）有 5 個常規關卡、2 個 Boss 和 1 個秘密關卡。常規關卡是指你只需擊敗它們並獲得其中某些物品的關卡。

Boss 關卡中，你會經歷一個部分，然後在最後與怪物戰鬥。秘密關卡是您收集拼圖的關卡。一旦您收集了所有 4 個秘密關卡中的拼圖並擊敗但丁男爵，“交換遇見皮特”將帶您前往丟失的關卡。

Hammerin' Harry (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (.original_name: Daiku no Gen-san : Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi
Hammerin' Harry (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (.name: 大空之源桑：咔咔咔的轟鳴聲
Hammerin' Harry (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (.original_desc: Daiku no Gen-san: Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi is an action/platforming game developed by Biox and published by Gaps for the Game Boy Color platform. Daiku no Gen-san: Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi was never released outside of Japan.
Hammerin' Harry (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (.desc: Daiku no Gen-san: Kachikachi no Tonkachi ga Kachi 是一款由 Biox 開發並由 Gaps 為 Game Boy Color 平台發行的動作/平台遊戲。《大空的源先生：響噹噹的大爆炸》從未在日本以外地區發行。

Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB.key: Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB.original_name: Legend of the River King GBC
Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB.name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB.original_desc: Your sister is ill and you must find the Guardian Fish to save her in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING. Travel throughout the world and blaze trails to find the best fishing holes. Be careful though, because you might have to fight wild animals with your bare hands. You can catch fish with either bait or lures, each with relative strengths and weaknesses. After catching a small one, keep it stress-free in an aquarium and watch it grow. Hopefully, you will be able to find the Guardian Fish and save your sister in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING.
Legend of the River King GBC (USA) (SGB.desc: 在《河王傳說》中，你的妹妹病了，你必須找到守護魚來拯救她。環遊世界，開闢道路，尋找最好的釣魚洞。不過要小心，因為你可能不得不徒手與野生動物搏鬥。您可以使用魚餌或魚餌來釣魚，每種魚都有相對的優點和缺點。捕獲一隻小魚後，將其無壓力地放在水族箱中並觀察其成長。希望你能在《河王傳說》中找到守護魚並拯救你的妹妹。

Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.key: Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.original_name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.name: Xbox 360游戏列表
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.original_desc:
Edward Carnaby, private eye of the paranormal, is back.

Carnaby's best friend, Charles Fiske, has been found dead near Shadow Island--a mysterious island near Maine. It is your duty to take up the investigation and find out the secrets of Shadow Island. The game takes place in the surrounding grounds of a gloomy mansion. The game is dark...very dark, and in true survival horror style there are many things lurking, waiting to pounce.

9 years after the original was released, the game that started it all returns for a new chapter in the Alone in the Dark series.

Can you see.......beyond your fear?
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.desc:
超自然現象的私家偵探愛德華·卡納比回來了。

卡納比最好的朋友查爾斯·菲斯克被發現死在影子島（緬因州附近的一個神秘島嶼）附近。你的職責是接受調查並找出暗影島的秘密。遊戲發生在一座陰暗豪宅的周圍場地。遊戲很黑暗……非常黑暗，在真正的生存恐怖風格中，有很多東西潛伏著，等待著襲擊。

原作發行 9 年後，這款開啟這一切的遊戲回歸，為《鬼屋魔影》系列開啟新篇章。

你能看到……超越你的恐懼嗎？

Bionic Commando - Elite Forces (USA, Aus.name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Bionic Commando - Elite Forces (USA, Aus.original_desc:
The Avar empire is an imminent threat to our homeland of Karinia. As a member of the Bionic Corps' Elite Forces team your mission is to infiltrate the Avar installations, disrupt their invasion plans and rescue our scout, fellow bionic commando, Commander Joe. You play a bionic soldier with a mechanic arm that extends and contracts to let you interact with objects normally out of reach.
The game is based on the Bionic Commando arcade game and is a typical platform game with the emphasis on the capabilities your bionic arms gives you. You can use it to swing from platform to platform, pull yourself up onto higher platforms, and attack enemies with it. A few other weapons and a range of pickups is also available. At the start of the game you also get to choose to play a male or female commando.
Bionic Commando - Elite Forces (USA, Aus.desc:
阿瓦爾帝國對我們的祖國卡里尼亞構成了迫在眉睫的威脅。作為仿生軍團精銳部隊的一員，你的任務是滲透阿瓦爾設施，破壞他們的入侵計劃並營救我們的偵察兵、仿生突擊隊同伴喬指揮官。你扮演一個仿生士兵，他的機械臂可以伸展和收縮，讓你可以與通常夠不到的物體互動。
該遊戲基於仿生突擊隊街機遊戲，是一款典型的平台遊戲，重點在於仿生手臂為您提供的功能。你可以用它從一個平台擺動到另一個平台，將自己拉到更高的平台上，並用它攻擊敵人。還提供一些其他武器和一系列皮卡。在遊戲開始時，您還可以選擇扮演男性或女性突擊隊。

Aliens - Thanatos Encounter (USA, Europe.name: 異形:遭遇塔納托斯
Aliens - Thanatos Encounter (USA, Europe.original_desc: Prepare for horror and fright beyond your wildest nightmares, as you step into the world of ALIENS: Thanatos Encounter. The terrifying creatures made famous by the popular ALIENS movies come to Game Boy Color in a totally new adventure. You play as one of five space marines who are sent to explore an abandoned freighter. Naturally, the situation is far worse than your squad expected the ship is completely infested with thousands of vicious aliens. In this single-player shooter, you'll make your way through the various sections of the ship in 12 missions. Discover the solution to the mystery of the aliens' reappearance through the cinematic cutscenes you'll see throughout the game. You can use a variety of alien-busting weapons like machine guns and flame-throwers to fend off the incoming horde and, if all else fails, turn tail and run as fast as you can! Battle a wide variety of different breeds of aliens, including some all-new hybrids.
Aliens - Thanatos Encounter (USA, Europe.desc: 當您踏入《異形：遭遇塔納托斯》的世界時，請做好迎接最瘋狂噩夢之外的恐怖和恐懼的準備。因熱門《異形》電影而聞名的恐怖生物來到 Game Boy Color，開啟全新冒險之旅。你扮演五名太空海軍陸戰隊員之一，被派去探索一艘廢棄的貨輪。當然，情況比你的小隊預期的要糟糕得多，船上已經完全擠滿了數千名邪惡的外星人。在這款單人射擊遊戲中，您將在 12 個任務中穿越飛船的各個部分。通過您在遊戲中看到的電影過場動畫，發現外星人再次出現之謎的解決方案。你可以使用機槍和火焰噴射器等各種消滅外星人的武器來擊退入侵的部落，如果其他方法都失敗了，那就轉身盡可能快地逃跑！與各種不同品種的外星人戰鬥，包括一些全新的混血兒。

Mario Golf (USA).name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Mario Golf (USA).original_desc:
Mario Golf on Game Boy Color isn't a straight port of the N64 game - it's a totally different game in its own right. It is a combination of a golf game and an RPG. As in an RPG, you choose your character at the beginning, with various strengths and weaknesses, and throughout the course of the game, your character gains experience points through winning matches or playing mini-games. Experience points can be distributed to various skills, such as putting, which makes it easier for you to do well. There are quite a few skills, and no two characters you can create will play in exactly the same way.

Although the story mode is the main part of the game, there's quite a few other modes to keep you busy, like Tournament, Match Game, Stroke, Training, and the two-player mode via link cable. It comes with a dictionary of all the golf terms you'll need, and an extensive range of statistics on your player.
Mario Golf (USA).desc:
Game Boy Color 上的《馬里奧高爾夫》並不是 N64 遊戲的直接移植版 - 它本身就是一款完全不同的遊戲。它是高爾夫遊戲和角色扮演遊戲的結合。就像在角色扮演遊戲中一樣，你在一開始就選擇你的角色，有不同的優點和缺點，在整個遊戲過程中，你的角色通過贏得比賽或玩迷你游戲來獲得經驗值。經驗值可以分配到各種技能上，比如推桿，讓你更容易做好。有相當多的技能，而且你創建的兩個角色不會以完全相同的方式發揮作用。

雖然故事模式是遊戲的主要部分，但還有很多其他模式可以讓您忙碌起來，例如錦標賽、比賽、比桿、訓練以及通過連接線進行的兩人模式。它附帶了您需要的所有高爾夫術語的字典，以及有關您的球員的廣泛統計數據。

Legend of the River King 2 (USA) (SGB En.key: Legend of the River King 2 (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Legend of the River King 2 (USA) (SGB En.name: Game Source Entertainment
Legend of the River King 2 (USA) (SGB En.original_desc:
More fishing adventures on the Game Boy. This time, there are plenty more fish and other river creatures that you can catch and collect, including 60 types of fish, shellfish, plants and insects. Other animals living around the river can smell your catch and may attack you.

A new element in the game is the ability to trade your fish, etc. with other players. Link up with another friend to trade your catch, either in Legend of the River King 2 or another Natsume title, Harvest Moon.
Legend of the River King 2 (USA) (SGB En.desc: 官方Game Boy Advance平台的2,819款遊戲中，一塊遊戲卡匣的容量為0.5Mb至256Mb不等，其中以32Mb、64Mb及128Mb的遊戲作品最多。本列表共有1,074款Game Boy Advance遊戲。

Metal Gear Solid (USA).name: 潛龍諜影4 愛國者之槍
Metal Gear Solid (USA).original_desc:
Metal Gear Solid for GameBoy Color is not set within the storyline of Metal Gear series, but instead tells an unrelated episode featuring the same hero - special agent Solid Snake. A secret government project, codenamed "Babel", attempts to revive the Metal Gear project - development of a highly destructive mech weapon. But an organization known as Gindran Liberation Front hijacked the Metal Gear prototype, without which any further development would be useless. Solid Snake is sent to infiltrate Outer Heaven, a location not entirely unfamiliar to him, and to retrieve the prototype.

The game is similar in style and gameplay to early Metal Gear games. It is viewed from top-down perspective, and its gameplay is mostly based on stealth. Snake has to sneak past the guards, using various tactics to distract them or to kill them silently. From time to time Snake will also encounter bosses whom he will have to defeat in order to proceed to the next area.
Metal Gear Solid (USA).desc:
任天堂3DS（日語：ニンテンドー3DS，英語：Nintendo 3DS，簡稱「N3DS」或「3DS」），是任天堂於2011年至2020年推出的攜帶型遊戲機，為任天堂DS的後續機種。最大特點是利用了視差障壁技術，讓使用者不需配戴任何特殊眼鏡即可裸視感受到立體3D圖像效果。該平台向下相容任天堂DS和任天堂DSi的軟體。
2012年9月28日台灣與香港同步發行繁體中文版的「Nintendo 3DS」以及「Nintendo 3DS XL」。2012年11月1日中國大陸地區由神遊科技發行的簡體中文版「iQue 3DS XL」（神遊DS雙螢幕互動多媒體系統）主機正式公布，12月1日起陸續供貨發售。
任天堂3DS有五個衍生機型，分別是2012年7月發售的大螢幕版本任天堂3DS XL（日本稱LL）；2013年10月在歐美發售的廉價型號任天堂2DS；2014年10月起在日本發售的新任天堂3DS與新任天堂3DS LL/XL；以及於2017年7月起發售的新任天堂2DS XL。

Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, E.key: Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, Europe)
Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, E.original_name: Tomb Raider : Curse of the Sword
Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, E.name: 古墓丽影系列
Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, E.original_desc: Released in conjunction with the LARA CROFT: Tomb Raider film starring Angelina Jolie, Curse of the Sword is one of the more advanced titles ever created for the Game Boy Color. While averting a museum robbery, Lara is wounded ever so slightly by what seems to be a cursed sword. Now, her worst fears are beginning to come true, as a bizarre cult based out of New Orleans is plotting to steal her soul. Help the lovely and talented Ms. Croft save herself as you control her through worldly adventures of all sorts. An equal blend of puzzle solving and action, the game boasts a unique control system that allows for maximum character response. You'll be collecting keys and artifacts throughout the experience, each of which will help you to unlock doors and secrets. Graced by perfect animation and epic gameplay, TOMB RAIDER: Curse of the Sword is a welcome addition to the long line of brilliant TOMB RAIDER games.
Tomb Raider - Curse of the Sword (USA, E.desc: 《詛咒之劍》與安吉麗娜·朱莉主演的《古墓麗影：古墓麗影》電影一起發行，是 Game Boy Color 有史以來最先進的遊戲之一。在避免一場博物館搶劫時，勞拉被一把似乎被詛咒的劍輕傷。現在，她最擔心的事情開始成真，一個來自新奧爾良的奇異邪教正密謀竊取她的靈魂。幫助可愛又才華橫溢的克羅夫特女士拯救自己，控制她經歷各種世俗冒險。該遊戲將解謎和動作完美結合，擁有獨特的控制系統，可實現最大程度的角色反應。您將在整個體驗過程中收集鑰匙和文物，每一件都將幫助您解鎖門和秘密。憑藉完美的動畫和史詩般的遊戲玩法，《古墓麗影：劍之詛咒》成為了眾多精彩的《古墓麗影》遊戲中的又一受歡迎的新成員。

Rayman (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).name: 雷射超人 起源
Rayman (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).original_desc:
When a villain known only as Mr. Dark appears, trouble brews in Rayman's world. Mr. Dark captures the Toons - source of light and Rayman's friends. With no more light, evil creatures begin to roam, making the world unsafe for everyone. Its up to you, as Rayman, to free your friends and put an end to Mr. Dark's dastardly schemes!

Rayman is side-scrolling platformer starring the titular Rayman, a big-nosed chap with no arms or legs. Rayman can jump and use his hair to hover for a short period of time. He can also attack by throwing his fists, or winding up his fists for a more powerful punch. He can occasionally find special power ups that grant him unlimited flying power, giving him the ability to navigate through tricky mazes.

The Game Boy Color version of Rayman remains true to the spirit of the original game, but makes some notable changes, particularly when compared to the original's bright, vibrant graphics.
Rayman (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).desc:
當一個只被稱為“黑暗先生”的惡棍出現時，雷曼的世界裡出現了麻煩。黑暗先生抓住了卡通人——光源和雷曼的朋友們。沒有更多的光明，邪惡的生物開始漫遊，使世界對每個人來說都不安全。作為雷曼，你有責任釋放你的朋友並結束黑暗先生的卑鄙計劃！

《雷曼》是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，主角為雷曼，一個沒有胳膊或腿的大鼻子傢伙。雷曼可以跳躍並利用他的頭髮短暫懸停。他還可以通過揮拳進行攻擊，或者纏繞拳頭以產生更強大的拳頭。他偶爾會發現特殊的能量提升，賦予他無限的飛行能力，讓他能夠穿越棘手的迷宮。

Game Boy Color 版本的雷曼仍然忠於原版遊戲的精神，但做出了一些顯著的變化，特別是與原版明亮、充滿活力的圖形相比。

Grandia - Parallel Trippers (Japan) (Tra.name: Grandia：並行脫扣器
Grandia - Parallel Trippers (Japan) (Tra.original_desc:
This is a Game Boy spin-off from the original Grandia game on Saturn and Playstation.

It tells the tale of three school children named Yuuhi, Mizuki and Shirou who get sucked into the world of Grandia. In the course of the game you meet the cast of the original Grandia game like Justin, Feena, Sue etc.

Though the characters from Grandia appear in it, it is not a continuation of the Grandia storyline.
Grandia - Parallel Trippers (Japan) (Tra.desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

Bugs Bunny - Crazy Castle 3 (USA, Europe.key: Bugs Bunny - Crazy Castle 3 (USA, Europe) (GB Compatible)
Bugs Bunny - Crazy Castle 3 (USA, Europe.name: 喷神James节目列表
Bugs Bunny - Crazy Castle 3 (USA, Europe.original_desc:
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle brings the gameplay from Bugs Bunny in Crazy Castle and its sequel to the Game Boy Color. In the game you play as Bugs Bunny and you have to find a treasure hidden in an old castle. Unfortunately the witch Hazel put your friends (other Looney Tunes characters such as Daffy Duck, Yosemite Sam, Sylvester and Wile E. Coyote) under a spell and they will try anything to prevent you from reaching your goal.

You will have to guide Bugs Bunny through 60 levels in and around the castle. In each level you have to find eight keys to unlock the door to the next level.

You can collect carrots for more lives and there are a variety of weapons you can pick up to take care of your enemies, including bombs, lightning, cork gun, juice and weights. Other items such as a hammer or pick-axe can help you get past level obstacles. Shields, clocks and shoes will protect you from your enemies.

As Bugs Bunny you can walk around, climb stairs, use elevators and climb through tunnels to navigate around the screen.
Bugs Bunny - Crazy Castle 3 (USA, Europe.desc:
兔八哥瘋狂城堡帶來了《瘋狂城堡》中的兔八哥及其 Game Boy Color 續作的遊戲玩法。在遊戲中，你扮演兔八哥，你必須找到隱藏在一座古老城堡中的寶藏。不幸的是，金縷梅對你的朋友（其他樂一通角色，如達菲鴨、優勝美地山姆、西爾維斯特和懷爾·E·狼）施了咒語，他們會想盡辦法阻止你實現目標。

您必須引導兔八哥通過城堡內外的 60 個關卡。在每個級別中，您必須找到八把鑰匙才能打開下一級別的門。

你可以收集胡蘿蔔以獲得更多生命，你可以拿起各種武器來對付你的敵人，包括炸彈、閃電、軟木槍、果汁和重物。其他物品（例如錘子或鎬）可以幫助您越過關卡障礙。盾牌、時鐘和鞋子將保護你免受敵人的傷害。

作為兔八哥，你可以四處走動、爬樓梯、使用電梯和爬過隧道來在屏幕上導航。

Blaster Master - Enemy Below (USA, Europ.key: Blaster Master - Enemy Below (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Blaster Master - Enemy Below (USA, Europ.name: 爆破大師：下面的敵人
Blaster Master - Enemy Below (USA, Europ.original_desc:
Taking place sometime after the events of the original Blaster Master, Blaster Master: Enemy Below puts you once again behind the wheels of Sophia 3 as a genetically engineered threat looms from the underground once again.

Gameplay-wise the game plays like a remake of the first game, with similar levels and challenges, and featuring the same on wheels/on foot dual gameplay modes while adding new weapons and upgrades.
Blaster Master - Enemy Below (USA, Europ.desc:
《Blaster Master：地下敵人》發生在原版《Blaster Master》事件之後的某個時間，讓您再次駕駛 Sophia 3，感受來自地下的基因工程威脅再次逼近。

在遊戲玩法方面，該遊戲就像第一款遊戲的翻版，具有相似的關卡和挑戰，並具有相同的輪子/步行雙遊戲模式，同時添加了新武器和升級。

Resident Evil Gaiden (USA).name: 生化危机 外传
Resident Evil Gaiden (USA).original_desc:
It's believed that Umbrella, the creators of the deadly virus that wiped out Raccoon City, has developed a new Bio Organic Weapon on a cruise ship called the Starlight, which is on its way to Europe. One S.T.A.R.S. member, Leon S Kennedy (from Resident Evil 2) was sent out to destroy the weapon, but the team have been unable to contact him since he arrived at the ship.

Using a combination of top down side-scrolling action and 1st person shooter, it is your job to get aboard the liner, currently floating in the Atlantic Ocean, destroy the weapon and find Leon. Along the way, you'll come across plenty of deadly  undead enemies, similar to those found in the original Resident Evil series, while using a range of weapons and items found in the ship.
Resident Evil Gaiden (USA).desc:
據信，消滅浣熊市的致命病毒的創造者安布雷拉在一艘名為星光號的遊輪上開發了一種新的生物有機武器，該遊輪正在前往歐洲。一顆星星成員萊昂·S·肯尼迪（《生化危機 2》中的角色）被派出去銷毀武器，但自從他到達船上後，團隊就無法聯繫到他。

結合自上而下的橫向捲軸動作和第一人稱射擊遊戲，你的任務是登上目前漂浮在大西洋上的遊輪，摧毀武器並找到萊昂。一路上，你會遇到大量致命的不死敵人，類似於原版《生化危機》系列中的敵人，同時使用船上的一系列武器和物品。

Blade (USA, Europe).name: 劍星
Blade (USA, Europe).original_desc: You're Blade, Gothic City's baddest vampire hunter. When rival vampire clams ignite a deadly feud, you go deep to do some serious demon killing. Stalk the undead through 24 gothic locations, then waste an arsenal of intense weapons. Plan on staying up late tonight, 'cause an even greater evil awaits.
Blade (USA, Europe).desc: 你是刀鋒，哥特城最糟糕的吸血鬼獵人。當敵對的吸血蛤點燃致命的仇恨時，你要深入進行一些嚴重的惡魔殺戮。在 24 個哥特式地點追踪不死族，然後浪費大量強力武器。計劃今晚熬夜，因為更大的邪惡在等待著。

Mega Man Xtreme (USA, Europe) (GB Compat.name: Greatest Hits
Mega Man Xtreme (USA, Europe) (GB Compat.original_desc: Mega Man X hits the Gameboy Color! When an unknown hacker group breaks into a super system known as the Mother Computer, havoc breaks out all over the world! X and Zero are called in to find and destroy this hacker group and restore the Mother Computer before the world is thrust into chaos!
Mega Man Xtreme (USA, Europe) (GB Compat.desc: 《洛克人 X》推出 Gameboy 配色！當一個未知的黑客組織闖入一個被稱為“計算機母機”的超級系統時，世界各地爆發了浩劫！X 和零被召喚來尋找並摧毀這個黑客組織，並在世界陷入混亂之前恢復計算機主機！

Yu-Gi-Oh! - Dark Duel Stories (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Yu-Gi-Oh! - Dark Duel Stories (USA).original_desc:
Dark Duel Stories brings the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game to you via Gameboy Color.  Battle your way past opponents from the TV show and manga as well as your friends using the Link Cable.

In Dark Duel Stories, you must defeat your opponents to advance and eventually make it to the four Rulers of Ancient Egypt who have the Millennium pieces.  As you win battles, you will get new cards as well as card parts that can be used to construct more cards.

Set up your deck with monsters, traps, and spells to help you defeat your opponents.  And don't forget to bring along some fusion monsters to help when you get into trouble, or just to help finish off your opponent.
Yu-Gi-Oh! - Dark Duel Stories (USA).desc:
黑暗決鬥故事帶來游戲王！通過 Gameboy Color 為您提供紙牌遊戲。使用鏈接電纜與電視節目和漫畫中的對手以及您的朋友戰鬥。

在《黑暗決鬥故事》中，你必須擊敗對手才能晉級，並最終晉級到擁有千年碎片的古埃及四位統治者手中。當你贏得戰鬥時，你將獲得新卡牌以及可用於構建更多卡牌的卡牌部件。

用怪物、陷阱和咒語設置你的牌組來幫助你擊敗對手。不要忘記帶上一些融合怪物來幫助你遇到麻煩，或者只是幫助消滅你的對手。

Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adven.key: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adventure (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adven.name: 龍武士怪獸2 : 塔拉的冒險
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adven.original_desc: Like the original Dragon Warrior Monsters for the Game Boy Color, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure combines themes and characters from Enix' long-running Dragon Warrior series with aspects of gameplay established in the amazingly popular Pokémon handheld games. Players take on the role of Tara as she embarks on a new adventure of monster collecting, training, and combat. A concurrently released companion game, Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey, follows the similar adventures of Tara's brother.
Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 - Tara's Adven.desc:
2022年電子遊戲產業有諸多新作發售。
根據SteamDB統計，2022年全年Steam發佈新遊戲超過一萬二千五百款。

Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA.key: Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA)
Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA.original_name: Batman Beyond : Return of the Joker
Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA.name: 特羅伊·貝克
Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA.original_desc:
Based off the movie, Batman Beyond puts the player on the streets of Gotham (Beyond) to take out the ever-grinning Joker, but before that an obvious long line of his evil minions - some of which are genetically engineered.

Scroll around, punch, kick, play with bat-weapons, and avoid being on the receiving end of those attacks. There are multiple 'bat suits' that you can choose from, each with their own special abilities and purposes.

Mostly a 3-D beat-the-living-sunshine-out-of-whatever-moves type.
Batman Beyond - Return of the Joker (USA.desc:
根據電影改編，《超越蝙蝠俠》讓玩家在哥譚市的街道上乾掉永遠咧著嘴笑的小丑，但在此之前，他的邪惡爪牙明顯排著長隊——其中一些是經過基因改造的。

滾動、拳擊、踢腿、使用蝙蝠武器，並避免成為這些攻擊的接收端。有多種“蝙蝠套裝”可供您選擇，每種套裝都有自己的特殊能力和用途。

大多是 3D 擊敗活生生的陽光，不擇手段的類型。

Motocross Maniacs 2 (USA).name: Game Boy游戏列表
Motocross Maniacs 2 (USA).original_desc:
Motocross Maniacs 2 is the follow up to the Game Boy title Motocross Maniacs. Much like in the previous iteration of the game, the aim is to ride a dirt-bike through side-scrolling courses filled with loops, jumps, ramps and hills. There are many bonus items to help the player along the way, such as nitro boosts and super suspension.

The player has the option to play against a computer player or a friend (via Link Cable), as well as Time Trial or Championship.

There is also a level editor and room for three saved custom tracks made by the player.
Motocross Maniacs 2 (USA).desc:
Motocross Maniacs 2 是 Game Boy 遊戲 Motocross Maniacs 的後續作品。與遊戲的前一版本非常相似，目標是騎著越野車穿過充滿環路、跳躍、坡道和山丘的橫向捲軸賽道。一路上有許多獎勵物品可以幫助玩家，例如硝基助推器和超級懸架。

玩家可以選擇與電腦玩家或朋友（通過連接線）對抗，也可以選擇計時賽或錦標賽。

還有一個關卡編輯器和用於保存玩家製作的三個自定義曲目的空間。

Shantae (USA).name: 桑塔
Shantae (USA).original_desc:
The small fishing village of Scuttle Town is a quiet and peaceful place, thanks mainly to its protector, the self-appointed Shantae the genie.

When lady-pirate Risky Boots receives information that a  treasure chest is found at the village, she quickly makes her way there for an invasion to take the cash. As Shantae, you must use the genies magical abilities, her hair whipping attacks and dance moves to stop the pirate and her gang from taking the treasure and leaving the town in ruins.
Shantae (USA).desc:
斯卡特爾鎮的小漁村是一個安靜祥和的地方，這主要歸功於它的保護者，自封的精靈桑塔。

當女海盜瑞斯基·布茨收到在村莊發現寶箱的消息時，她迅速前往那裡進行入侵以獲取現金。作為桑塔，你必須使用精靈的魔法能力、她的頭髮鞭打攻擊和舞蹈動作來阻止海盜和她的團伙奪走寶藏並使小鎮成為廢墟。

Dragon Warrior III (USA).name: 勇者鬥惡龍系列
Dragon Warrior III (USA).original_desc: Your father, the brave Ortega, is dead. He set off to destroy the Demon Lord Baramos but fell in glorious battle. Unless stopped, Baramos will unleash a torrent of evil that will destroy the world. You must stop Baramos and discover the legend of Dragon Warrior! Your journey starts on Aliahan. Only you decide where it ends...
Dragon Warrior III (USA).desc: 你的父親，勇敢的奧爾特加，死了。他出發去消滅魔王巴拉莫斯，但卻在光榮的戰鬥中陣亡。除非阻止，巴拉莫斯將釋放邪惡洪流，毀滅世界。你必須阻止巴拉莫斯並發現龍戰士的傳說！您的旅程從阿利亞漢開始。只有你決定結局在哪裡......

Dragon Warrior Monsters (USA, Europe) (S.name: 勇者鬥惡龍系列
Dragon Warrior Monsters (USA, Europe) (S.original_desc:
In Dragon Warrior Monsters, enter Terry's Wonderland, a magical place of kings, monsters and magic spells.  Make monsters your allies to fight through the dangers that lie ahead in the long quest.  Find your kidnapped sister and become the most powerful monster master in the world!

Each monster has unique special skills to use in battle.  Train and treat them well, and you?ll be victorious!  Over 40,000 different combinations - can you breed the rarest and most powerful monsters?

* Over 200 cute & cool monsters to collect, tame, and train.
* Breed your trained monsters to make more powerful monsters, each receiving special skills from their parent monsters.
* Play solo, or use the Game Link cable to link to Game Boy game systems and battle and breed with your friends? monsters.
* A spin off of Japan?s best selling RPG game, Enix?s Dragon Quest.
Dragon Warrior Monsters (USA, Europe) (S.desc:
在《龍戰士怪物》中，進入特里的仙境，這是一個充滿國王、怪物和魔法咒語的神奇之地。讓怪物成為你的盟友，共同應對漫長任務中面臨的危險。找到你被綁架的妹妹，成為世界上最強大的怪物大師！

每個怪物都有獨特的特殊技能可以在戰鬥中使用。好好訓練並善待他們，你就會取得勝利！超過 40,000 種不同的組合 - 你能培育出最稀有、最強大的怪物嗎？

* 超過 200 種可愛酷炫的怪物可供收集、馴服和訓練。
* 培育經過訓練的怪物，使其成為更強大的怪物，每個怪物都從其父母怪物那裡獲得特殊技能。
* 單獨玩，或使用 Game Link 線連接到 Game Boy 遊戲系統並與朋友一起戰鬥和繁殖？怪物。
* 日本最暢銷的 RPG 遊戲 Enix 的 Dragon Quest 的衍生產品。

Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons.key: Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons (USA, Australia)
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : Oracle of Seasons
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons.name: 塞爾達傳說：季節神諭
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons.original_desc: The land of Holodrum is slowly withering. Onox, the General of Darkness, has imprisoned the Oracle of Seasons and is draining the very life out of the land. With the seasons in tumult and the forces of evil running rampant, the world looks for a hero... and finds Link. His quest won't be easy - he'll have to master the seasons themselves if he's to turn back the evil tide.
Legend of Zelda, The - Oracle of Seasons.desc: Holodrum的土地正在慢慢枯萎。黑暗將軍奧諾克斯囚禁了季節神諭，並正在榨乾大地的生命。隨著季節的動盪和邪惡勢力的猖獗，全世界都在尋找英雄……並找到了林克。他的任務並不容易——如果他想扭轉邪惡的潮流，他就必須掌握季節本身。

Mr. Driller (USA).name: 万代南梦宫电子游戏系列列表
Mr. Driller (USA).original_desc:
Mr Driller's world has been covered with mysterious blocks. Armed with only a mighty drill, you'll have to dig your way down to safety before his air supply runs out!

Mr Driller is a real-time puzzle game that relies solely on quick-thinking and a bit of planning.  Gameplay is a combination of Tetris and Boulder Dash: You have to drill down through multi-colored blocks to reach the bottom while avoiding the consequences of reckless drilling (blocks may fall on you and crush you).
Mr. Driller (USA).desc:
鑽先生的世界被神秘的方塊所覆蓋。你只需要攜帶一把強大的鑽頭，就必須在他的空氣供應耗盡之前挖到安全的地方！

Mr Driller 是一款實時益智遊戲，完全依賴於快速思維和一點計劃。遊戲玩法是俄羅斯方塊和巨石沖刺的結合：你必須鑽過多彩的方塊才能到達底部，同時避免魯莽鑽探的後果（方塊可能會掉落到你身上並壓碎你）。

Asterix & Obelix (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).name: 阿斯特里克斯和奧貝利克斯
Asterix & Obelix (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).original_desc: Caesar has had a palisade constructed around the village inhabited by the Indomitable Gauls in order to keep them prisoner! Choose Obelix or Asterix and set off across the Roman Empire! Bring back a souvenir from each country crossed in order to prove to Caesar that our heroes are the strongest!
Asterix & Obelix (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es).desc: 凱撒在不屈的高盧人居住的村莊周圍建造了柵欄，以將他們囚禁起來！選擇奧貝利克斯或阿斯特里克斯，出發穿越羅馬帝國！每個穿越的國家都帶回紀念品，向凱撒證明我們的英雄是最強的！

Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (U.key: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Pt,Sv,No,Da,Fi)
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (U.original_name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (U.name: 魯伯·葛林特
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (U.original_desc:
In the first Harry Potter game for the Game Boy Color, the story of Harry's first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is told in the form of a traditional role-playing game.

Playing as Harry, one advances through the plot of the book and the movie by fulfilling quests, battling monsters and gaining experience and levels.

Combat is turn-based, with Harry being able to use a variety of spells against various critters and other enemies. In addition, card combinations of Famous Witches and Wizards Collector's Cards can be used to produce powerful magical effects. These cards can be found all over the freely explorable Hogwarts. Potions that refill stamina and magic points can be found, bought or mixed by Harry himself, but only with the right ingredients.
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (U.desc:
Game Source Entertainment（又名亞洲遊戲娛樂公司），簡稱「GSE」，於2006年成立，其主要業務遊戲發行及代理流通，是目前亞洲區內主要主機遊戲發行及代理流通商其中之一，亦是索尼互動娛樂和任天堂的授權遊戲發行商及Google Inc.和iTunes Gift Card合作夥伴。除此之外，GSE另有直營的零售店「1 Station Game Store」，位於荃灣及旺角，售賣電玩遊戲主機，遊戲及配件。   
2020年9月24日，GSE更換新品牌Logo及宣佈於台灣新北市林口區創立中文化中心，主要負責日本乙女遊戲中文化翻譯工作。
2021年7月29日，GSE在九龍灣E-MAX舉行的「香港著名品牌（Famous Brands Hong Kong）全城品牌啟動禮」，入選「年度大會推介至尊入圍品牌」。
2022年8月18日，GSE成立15週年，隨著業務發展需要和公司規模的擴大，搬遷至新的辦公地址並設立總部，並把香港及華人開發遊戲作品發行至全亞洲包括日本及韓國地區，成為了中文化遊戲的先驅者之一。

Survival Kids 2 - Dasshutsu!! Futago-Jim.key: Survival Kids 2 - Dasshutsu!! Futago-Jima! (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible) (Translated)
Survival Kids 2 - Dasshutsu!! Futago-Jim.name: 可愛的孩子2：大樹！！二子島！
Survival Kids 2 - Dasshutsu!! Futago-Jim.original_desc: 2 brothers are seperated on Twin Islands and need to figure out how to escape the island alive. Survival skills are put to the test, as you hunt for food, make shelter and explore the great unknown islands.
Survival Kids 2 - Dasshutsu!! Futago-Jim.desc: 兩兄弟在雙子島上失散，需要弄清楚如何活著逃離該島。當你尋找食物、搭建庇護所並探索未知的巨大島嶼時，生存技能將受到考驗。

Crystalis (USA).name: 任天堂Switch Online
Crystalis (USA).original_desc:
October 1st, 1997 is known as END DAY. A great war encircles the globe and brings about an end to civilization. The surviving humans concluded that they could never repeat their mistakes and build a great tower in the sky to watch over the world and act accordingly to combat "evil". One hundred years have passed since then and a hidden cryogenic chamber in the mountains springs to life...

Crystalis is a top-down action RPG. Starting from the cryogenic chamber, the player takes the role of a mysterious hero who must uncover the mystery of the tower. The character may equip weapons, armor, shields and globe/bracelets on his body and a single item from his inventory for use in the field. To aid in the hero's goal. he will meet up with the four wise people and learn their magic, while also obtaining the four elemental swords which will help him progress. Players gain experience and gold from defeating monsters. The experience is used to gain levels and improve statistics, however a minimum level is required before one can do damage to specific bosses. Gold is used to purchase items in shops.
Crystalis (USA).desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Pokemon - Silver Version (USA, Europe) (.key: Pokemon - Silver Version (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Pokemon - Silver Version (USA, Europe) (.name: 寶可夢系列 (遊戲)
Pokemon - Silver Version (USA, Europe) (.original_desc: Enter a whole new world, with new Pokémon to capture, train and battle! Meet Professor Elm and get the all-new Poké Gear, including map, radio, cell phone and clock. Set the clock then watch as day turns to night and events take place in real time-and be sure to keep an eye out for Pokémon that come out only at night!
Pokemon - Silver Version (USA, Europe) (.desc: 進入一個全新的世界，捕捉、訓練和戰鬥新的神奇寶貝！與 Elm 教授見面並獲得全新的 Poké Gear，包括地圖、收音機、手機和時鐘。設置時鐘，然後觀察白天變成夜晚以及實時發生的事件 - 並且一定要留意只在晚上出現的神奇寶貝！

Pokemon - Crystal Version (USA, Europe).name: 寶可夢系列 (遊戲)
Pokemon - Crystal Version (USA, Europe).original_desc: Travel back to the world of Johto as the Gold and Silver series continues with brand-new features! Whether you're reading the fresh descriptions in your Pokédex, using the unique sort function to organize your Pokémon in new ways, watching the all-new battle animations, or discovering another ways to capture Suicune, you'll need all of your Poké-skills to master Pokémon Crystal on your Game Boy Color!
Pokemon - Crystal Version (USA, Europe).desc: 回到城都世界，金銀系列繼續推出全新功能！無論您是在閱讀 Pokédex 中的新鮮描述、使用獨特的排序功能以新的方式組織您的 Pokémon、觀看全新的戰鬥動畫，還是探索捕獲水君的其他方法，您都需要使用所有 Poké 技能來在 Game Boy Color 上掌握 Pokémon 水晶！

Metal Walker (USA) (GB Compatible).name: Rockstar North
Metal Walker (USA) (GB Compatible).original_desc:
Metal Walker is a mechanical take on Pokémon, where the story takes place in the future on an island where a mysterious element called core has been discovered.  This "core" element was used to create a highly advanced race of robots called Metal Walkers that are used for both labor and protection for the people of the island.  One day, however, a gang of robots decide to rebel and end up killing a very prominent member of the island.  The player then takes control of the son, Tetsuo, with the help of Dr. Hawk and Tetsuo's Metal Walker in an attempt to hunt down the rebel robots and avenge his father's death.

The gameplay is very similar to Pokémon, where the player explores various areas of the island searching for clues called Data Packets and battling other Metal Walkers or wild Walkers called Metal Busters, but instead of capturing these walkers, the player instead destroys them.  Destroying these other Walkers results both in scrap metal and items called Capsules that can be used to upgrade or "evolve" Tetsuo's Walker into a more advanced form.  Additionally, the player can take the scrap metal to the Junk Shop where they can also be turned into capsules as well.  Additionally, capsules can not only contain power-ups, but traps as well that can be used in battles.

The battles are also different, whereas this one the attacks consists of rolling attacks that are angled off of the walls of arenas.  Additionally, if a player fights multiple opponents, all of the enemies will be present on the screen at one time and if they choose the right attack and angle, can result in multiple hits on multiple opponents.

There are also three types of Walkers: Land, Marine, and Sky where, just like in Pokémon, susceptible to the other (ex. Land walkers have advantages over Marine walkers but are vulnerable and weaker to Sky Walker attacks).  Base camps can also be built around various areas of the island and can be used for restoring the health of the players Walker.

As the player progresses farther into the game, they will encounter over 100 different Walkers, each with their own strengths and weaknesses as well as bosses that have to be defeated in order to access more areas of the island.  Players can also use the Link Cable to both battle their Metal Walkers or even exchange their base camps.
Metal Walker (USA) (GB Compatible).desc:
《金屬行者》是《神奇寶貝》的機械版，故事發生在未來的一座島上，那裡發現了一種名為“核心”的神秘元素。這種“核心”元素被用來創建一種高度先進的機器人種族，稱為“金屬步行者”，用於島上人民的勞動和保護。然而有一天，一幫機器人決定反抗並最終殺死了島上一位非常重要的成員。然後，玩家在霍克博士和鐵男的金屬行者的幫助下控制兒子鐵男，試圖追捕叛軍機器人並為父親報仇。

遊戲玩法與神奇寶貝非常相似，玩家探索島上的各個區域，尋找稱為數據包的線索，並與其他金屬步行者或稱為金屬剋星的野生步行者戰鬥，但玩家不是捕獲這些步行者，而是摧毀它們。摧毀這些其他步行者會產生廢金屬和稱為膠囊的物品，這些物品可用於將 Tetsuo 的步行者升級或“進化”為更高級的形式。此外，玩家可以將廢金屬帶到垃圾店，在那裡它們也可以變成膠囊。此外，膠囊不僅可以容納能量道具，還可以容納可在戰鬥中使用的陷阱。

戰鬥也有所不同，而這一戰的攻擊包括從競技場牆壁傾斜的滾動攻擊。此外，如果玩家與多個對手作戰，所有敵人都會同時出現在屏幕上，如果他們選擇正確的攻擊和角度，可能會導致對多個對手的多次攻擊。

步行者也分為三種類型：陸地步行者、海洋步行者和天空步行者，就像神奇寶貝一樣，它們容易受到另一種步行者的影響（例如，陸地步行者比海洋步行者有優勢，但容易受到天行者的攻擊，並且較弱）。還可以在島嶼的各個區域周圍建造大本營，並可用於恢復玩家沃克的生命值。

隨著玩家在遊戲中進一步前進，他們將遇到 100 多個不同的步行者，每個步行者都有自己的優點和缺點，以及必須擊敗才能進入島上更多區域的 Boss。玩家還可以使用連接電纜與他們的金屬步行者戰鬥，甚至交換他們的大本營。
