Gremlins - Unleashed (Europe) (En,Fr,De,.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Gremlins - Unleashed (Europe) (En,Fr,De,.original_desc: In this game, the film's hero, Gizmo, attempts to find the gremlins and capture them all. In the meantime, the sinister Stripe and his army of 30 different gremlins decide to invade the town of Kingston Falls and try to transform Gizmo into a gremlin. The game can be played as either character. Gremlins: Unleashed! features 10 levels based in locations featured in the film, including Billy's house, the school laboratory, the department store, and the movie theater.
Gremlins - Unleashed (Europe) (En,Fr,De,.desc: 在這款遊戲中，電影的英雄 Gizmo 試圖找到小魔怪並捕獲它們。與此同時，險惡的條紋和他的 30 個不同小魔怪軍隊決定入侵金斯敦福爾斯鎮，並試圖將 Gizmo 變成小魔怪。遊戲可以扮演任一角色。小魔怪：釋放！共有 10 個關卡，取材於電影中的場景，包括比利的房子、學校實驗室、百貨商店和​​電影院。

Bomberman Max - Red Challenger (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Bomberman Max - Red Challenger (USA).original_desc:
The second half of the Bomberman Max series, Red Challenger is much the same as Blue Champion in terms of the tasks at hand for the main character. However, instead of playing as Bomberman, you play as Max, who still is much the same as Bomberman except for looks. The graphics are also slightly different for each level compared to Blue.

The task stays the same, plant bombs to destroy blocks and enemies in your way, as well as collecting Charabombs, creatures who act much the same as Pokémon where you raise the Charabombs and fight against other players. Certain Charabombs and levels are only available in Blue, so you must link with another Game Boy and the Blue Champion Edition to collect all of the Charabombs and complete the adventure.
Bomberman Max - Red Challenger (USA).desc:
Xbox Series X/S遊戲列表包括了正在開發中或確定發售的部分Xbox Series X/S遊戲，包含在Xbox One發售的遊戲可在當中遊玩，2020年11月10日起為首發遊戲，其他發售日前的遊戲為主機發售後包含在平台推出。

部份原來的Xbox One遊戲，可根據Xbox Series X的新功能Smart Delivery（中文暫稱為智慧型分發/智慧型推播）
以此功能直接免費升級至Xbox Series X的遊戲版本（並非One的模擬提高版本、為Series X的對應版本）。

Harvest Moon 3 GBC (USA).name: 牧場物語系列
Harvest Moon 3 GBC (USA).original_desc:
After much acclaim for your past farming accomplishments (as part of the previous Harvest Moon titles on GBC), you are asked by a young girl to help her get her farm up and running. The farm, situated on an island, needs plenty of work, so you need all your skills to get things working correctly.

Your many tasks range from tending to the farm animals, keeping an eye on the budget while purchasing goods (food, water, mechanical items, etc) at the local stores, and so forth. And although the main aim is to build and maintain the farm, there are plenty of opportunities to take care of yourself (go to the movies, buy pets, find a girlfriend/boyfriend).
Harvest Moon 3 GBC (USA).desc:
在你過去的農業成就備受讚譽之後（作為 GBC 之前的《Harvest Moon》遊戲的一部分），一名年輕女孩要求你幫助她建立和運營她的農場。農場位於一座島嶼上，需要大量工作，因此您需要發揮所有技能才能使事情正常運轉。

你的任務包括照顧農場動物、在當地商店購買商品（食物、水、機械物品等）時注意預算等等。儘管主要目標是建造和維護農場，但仍有很多機會照顧自己（看電影、購買寵物、找女朋友/男朋友）。

Dexter's Laboratory - Robot Rampage (USA.name: PlayStation游戏列表
Dexter's Laboratory - Robot Rampage (USA.original_desc:
Your laboratory has been filled up with evil robots. It's up to you, as Dexter, to make your way through different levels, picking up the necessary tools to rid your lab of the cybernetic menace.

Use laser pistols and other futuristic weapons to help dexter's cause, while searching for marked doors that contain either a new weapon or one of the items needed to complete the level.
Dexter's Laboratory - Robot Rampage (USA.desc:
你的實驗室裡充滿了邪惡的機器人。作為德克斯特，你需要通過不同的關卡，拿起必要的工具來消除你的實驗室的控制論威脅。

使用激光手槍和其他未來武器來幫助德克斯特的事業，同時尋找帶有標記的門，其中包含新武器或完成關卡所需的物品之一。

Bomberman Max - Blue Champion (USA).name: Game Boy游戏列表
Bomberman Max - Blue Champion (USA).original_desc:
Bomberman returns to the Game Boy Color. The adventure is much the same as before, plant bombs to blow up blocks and enemies that get in your way of the exit. 

Much like Pokémon before it, Max: Blue is one part of the adventure (the other being Max: Red Challenger Edition). During both games, you can pick up "Charabombs", creatures that you can raise as your own, and fight against other players Charabombs. It's a simple bonus game of Rock/Paper/Scissors, but the only way to complete the entire adventure is by linking both games together via link cable and pass over levels from one cart to the other, as each game has unique levels, so as to collect all of the Charabombs.

In Max: Blue you play as Bomberman himself, with all of the classic graphics and sounds that have been part of the series from the start.
Bomberman Max - Blue Champion (USA).desc:
炸彈人回歸 Game Boy 顏色。冒險與以前大致相同，放置炸彈炸毀阻礙你出口的方塊和敵人。

就像之前的神奇寶貝一樣，麥克斯：藍色是冒險的一部分（另一個是麥克斯：紅色挑戰者版）。在這兩款遊戲中，您都可以拾取“Charabombs”，您可以將其飼養為自己的生物，並與其他玩家的Charabombs戰鬥。這是一款簡單的石頭剪刀布獎勵遊戲，但完成整個冒險的唯一方法是通過連接線將兩個遊戲連接在一起，並將關卡從一個推車傳遞到另一個推車，因為每個遊戲都有獨特的關卡，從而收集所有的 Charabombs。

在《Max: Blue》中，你扮演炸彈人本人，並擁有該系列從一開始就包含的所有經典圖形和聲音。

Animorphs (USA).name: 神秘的古庙
Animorphs (USA).original_desc: Based on Scholastic's popular books and television series, Animorphs for Gameboy Color is a 2D action / RPG hybrid.  The evil Yeerks are invading Earth and only the Animorphs can stop them with their morphing power.  Play as all five members of the Animorphs and collect DNA from animals you meet - now you have the power to morph into these animals.  Keep your morphing power a secret from the regular humans, and use the correct morph at the right time to escape from tricky situations.  Play through five stages of RPG action and five 2D minigames in order to defeat the Yeerks and save the planet.
Animorphs (USA).desc: Gameboy Color 的 Animorphs 改編自 Scholastic 的熱門書籍和電視劇，是一款 2D 動作 / 角色扮演遊戲的混合體。邪惡的 Yeerks 正在入侵地球，只有 Animorphs 可以利用變形能力阻止他們。扮演 Animorphs 的所有五位成員，並從你遇到的動物身上收集 DNA - 現在你有能力變身為這些動物。對普通人類保密你的變形能力，並在正確的時間使用正確的變形來逃離棘手的情況。暢玩 RPG 動作的五個階段和五個 2D 迷你游戲，以擊敗 Yeerks 並拯救地球。

Croc (USA, Europe).name: Greatest Hits
Croc (USA, Europe).original_desc: All is not well in Croc's world.  His friends, the Gobbos, have been captured by the evil Baron Dante.  It is your mission in this 3D platformer to search through 42 different levels to save all of your friends before it's too late.
Croc (USA, Europe).desc: 鱷魚的世界並不美好。他的朋友戈布斯被邪惡的但丁男爵俘虜了。在這款 3D 平台遊戲中，您的任務是搜索 42 個不同的關卡，在為時已晚之前拯救您所有的朋友。

Pokemon Puzzle Challenge (USA, Australia.name: D.I.C.E.大奖
Pokemon Puzzle Challenge (USA, Australia.original_desc: Pokémon Puzzle Challenge is based on Panel de Pon (Tetris Attack), only with characters from the Pokémon franchise. The characters in Pokémon Puzzle Challenge are based on those in the Gold and Silver games, while those in Pokémon Puzzle League - its Nintendo 64 equivalent - were based more on the anime characters. However, the game is also focused around beating the Johto leaders in a puzzle challenge in Johto region. The game play mode is divided into 1 Player, 2 Player, and Training.
Pokemon Puzzle Challenge (USA, Australia.desc: Pokémon Puzzle Challenge 以 Panel de Pon（俄羅斯方塊攻擊）為基礎，僅包含 Pokémon 系列中的角色。《Pokémon Puzzle Challenge》中的角色基於金版和銀版遊戲中的角色，而《Pokémon Puzzle League》（任天堂 64 版本）中的角色則更多地基於動漫角色。然而，遊戲的重點還在於在城都地區的謎題挑戰中擊敗城都領導人。遊戲模式分為1人、2人、訓練。

Return of the Ninja (USA).name: Game Source Entertainment
Return of the Ninja (USA).original_desc:
Return of the Ninja is a side-scrolling beat 'm up game set in Japan. 

On a day when Tsukikage and Saiyuri return to their village, they see it on fire. The player takes the role of either of the two and has to stop the ones attacking the village and avenge their friends.

The character is controlled with the D-pad. The A and B-buttons are used to jump and attack. There's no fundamental difference in moves between the two characters, but they do feature different animations. Aside from enemies which need to be killed there's also environmental hazards such as fire which have to be avoided.
Return of the Ninja (USA).desc:
電子遊戲業2023年面世許多新電子遊戲。
根據SteamDB統計，2023年全年Steam發佈新遊戲超過一萬四千款。

Turok - Rage Wars (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,D.name: 白金版遊戲
Turok - Rage Wars (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,D.original_desc: Turok: Rage Wars is an action game, in which the main character Turok has to travel through four worlds while fighting enemies with multiple weapons. Each world is made of various levels, some of which have persistent scrolling. Weapons can be upgraded or combined to achieve various effects. The scenario is about Turok trying to prevent dinosaurs and bionosaurs to reach Earth through dimensional portals.
Turok - Rage Wars (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,D.desc:
本電子遊戲列表列舉了微軟Xbox360的電子遊戲。
對於中文名稱部分的說明：

列表中所有有官方中文的遊戲名字一律保持不變，絕大多數沒有官中的遊戲視情況而定：
一般來說這裡選擇的是在現有各類五花八門的譯名中接受程度最高的。
如果有同時存在民間和官方譯名的情況，那麼將使用如下格式，例如：
獵天使魔女 / 魔兵驚天錄
合金裝備崛起：復仇 / 潛龍諜影崛起：復仇
刺客信條 / 刺客教條
戰地 / 戰地風雲 等等，類似這樣。
但因為絕大多數遊戲（尤其是各種美式問答和體育遊戲）沒有官方譯名，目前還是民間譯名占大多數。以後這些中文譯名將被編輯者不定期維護更新。

Turok 2 - Seeds of Evil (USA, Europe) (E.key: Turok 2 - Seeds of Evil (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es) (GB Compatible)
Turok 2 - Seeds of Evil (USA, Europe) (E.name: 畅销任天堂64游戏列表
Turok 2 - Seeds of Evil (USA, Europe) (E.original_desc: Turok 2: Seeds of Evil is a 2D side-scrolling beat'em up (quite similar to Bad Dudes - only several levels have limited 2.5D gameplay). The game is very different from Turok 2: Seeds of Evil for PC and N64, which is a first-person shooter and has a different story. The player controls main hero Joshua Fireseed, who became Turok and fights against the Amaranthine Accordance, a legion of dinosoids. The gameplay is quite simple - the player goes left, jumps over holes and spikes, climbs up, and of course kills enemies, like humans, various dinosaurs, giant bees etc. The hero uses several weapons which must be found first. Certain levels have a different design compared to the rest of the game, such as riding on a dinosaur, for example
Turok 2 - Seeds of Evil (USA, Europe) (E.desc: Turok 2: Seeds of Evil 是一款 2D 橫向捲軸清版遊戲（與 Bad Dudes 非常相似 - 只有幾個關卡具有有限的 2.5D 遊戲玩法）。該遊戲與 PC 和 N64 版《Turok 2: Seeds of Evil》有很大不同，後者是第一人稱射擊遊戲，並且有不同的故事。玩家控制主角約書亞·火籽（Joshua Fireseed），他化身為圖洛克（Turok），與恐龍軍團“紫紅色軍團”（Amaranthine Accordance）作戰。遊戲玩法非常簡單——玩家向左走，跳過洞和尖刺，爬上去，當然還要殺死敵人，比如人類、各種恐龍、巨型蜜蜂等。英雄使用多種武器，必須先找到這些武器。與遊戲的其他部分相比，某些關卡的設計有所不同，例如騎在恐龍上

Donkey Kong Country (USA, Europe) (En,Fr.name: 咚奇剛 蕉力全開
Donkey Kong Country (USA, Europe) (En,Fr.original_desc:
King K. Rool has stolen Donkey Kong's banana stash, and Donkey Kong needs your help to get them back. In search of K. Rool, the Kremling horde impedes your progress. Kremlings, crocodile-like creatures, include Kritters (they succumb to a simple jump on the head), Krushas (they are virtually indestructible), and others. There are also other enemies that block your path, such as beavers, snakes, vultures. Leading them are dastardly bosses, including Very Gnawty, Necky, Bumble B, and Dumb Drum, and they all bar the way with their own special blend of villainy.

Donkey Kong is joined by Diddy Kong: these two primates differ significantly. For example, Donkey Kong is generally stronger; he can destroy most enemies with a single jump and can lift barrels straight over his head to throw them farther. On the other hand, Diddy is faster and not as strong as Donkey; he can run really fast and do cartwheels. Diddy carries barrels in front of him, creating a shield against frontal attacks.

The game is split into different worlds, which are split into different levels. Each level contains bonus areas, where one can collect bananas, medallions, and lives. At the end of each world is a boss, which is usually a larger version of a minor enemy.
Donkey Kong Country (USA, Europe) (En,Fr.desc:
King K. Rool 偷走了大金剛的香蕉藏品，大金剛需要你的幫助才能把它們找回來。為了尋找 K. Rool，克里姆林部落阻礙了你的前進。克里姆林人（Kremlings）是一種類似鱷魚的生物，包括克里特斯（Kritters）（它們只要簡單地跳到頭上就會屈服）、克魯沙斯（Krushas）（它們幾乎堅不可摧）等。還有其他敵人會擋住你的道路，例如海狸、蛇、禿鷹。領導他們的是卑鄙的老闆，包括 Very Gnawty、Necky、Bumble B 和 Dumb Drum，他們都以自己獨特的邪惡組合擋住了道路。

《大金剛》和《吹笛人》加入其中：這兩種靈長類動物之間存在顯著差異。比如，大金剛一般都比較強；他可以通過一次跳躍消滅大多數敵人，並且可以將木桶直接舉過頭頂，將它們扔得更遠。另一方面，迪迪（Diddy）速度更快，但力量不如驢子（Donkey）；他跑得很快，還能側手翻。吹牛老爹在身前舉著木桶，形成一道盾牌，抵禦正面攻擊。

遊戲分為不同的世界，世界又分為不同的關卡。每個級別都包含獎勵區域，您可以在其中收集香蕉、獎章和生命。每個世界的盡頭都有一個 Boss，通常是小敵人的放大版。

Monkey Puncher (Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (.name: 猴子拳手
Monkey Puncher (Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (.original_desc:
Monkey Puncher is a game where the goal is to train a monkey to fight in boxing matches in order to save your kidnapped sibling. You can choose to play as either a boy or a girl character; the one you do not pick is your sibling. 

Shortly after starting the game you are given your first monkey, Freddy. You can train him in skipping, using a punchbag, doing sit-ups, running and even going shopping. There is also a sixth activity, called sparring. These activities work to improve his speed, power, strength, stamina, knowledge and (for the latter activity) all of these, although only by a small amount.

In all of the aforementioned apart from shopping, you train your monkey by getting him to copy your actions; your actions are controlled by the rhythmic pressing of the A button. After a while, your monkey should be able to imitate your actions with ease, eventually being able to start the activity without prompting. In regards to shopping, you can send him out to buy what you want from a selection of items, or just let him go out and buy what he likes. This is a good way of obtaining certain items that are otherwise unobtainable. The rarity of items and the accuracy of which items it brings home from your shopping list increases as its knowledge does. Sparring involves pitting your own monkey against a computer controlled one in order to raise every stat by a small amount. Finally, you can 'date' your monkeys, either with each other, with a friend's monkey or in the dating shop available within the game. This is a good way of obtaining monkeys with higher stats, depending on which monkeys you breed and with whom. 

During boxing matches, you do not have direct control over your monkey, but in between bouts you can do things such as refill its health, stamina, or both. You can also advise it on what strategy to use against its opponent. These matches are won by either a count or by KO'ing the opponent, however if time runs out before there is a clear winner, the winner is the monkey who is left with the most health at the end of the match.
Monkey Puncher (Europe) (SGB Enhanced) (.desc:
Monkey Puncher 是一款遊戲，目標是訓練猴子參加拳擊比賽，以拯救被綁架的兄弟姐妹。你可以選擇扮演男孩或女孩角色；你不選擇的那個是你的兄弟姐妹。

開始遊戲後不久，你就會得到你的第一隻猴子，弗雷迪。你可以訓練他跳繩、使用沙袋、仰臥起坐、跑步，甚至去購物。還有第六項活動，稱為陪練。這些活動可以提高他的速度、力量、力量、耐力、知識以及（對於後一項活動）所有這些，儘管幅度很小。

在上述所有的事情中，除了購物之外，你還可以通過讓猴子模仿你的行為來訓練它。您的動作由有節奏地按下 A 按鈕來控制。一段時間後，你的猴子應該能夠輕鬆模仿你的動作，最終能夠在沒有提示的情況下開始活動。在購物方面，你可以派他出去挑選一些你想要的東西，或者就讓他出去買他喜歡的東西。這是獲得某些其他方式無法獲得的物品的好方法。隨著它的知識的增加，物品的稀有性以及它從購物清單中帶回家的物品的準確性也會增加。陪練包括讓你自己的猴子與計算機控制的猴子進行對戰，以便稍微提高每項統計數據。最後，您可以與您的猴子“約會”，可以是彼此之間、與朋友的猴子或在遊戲中的約會商店中。這是獲得具有更高屬性的猴子的好方法，具體取決於您飼養的猴子以及與誰飼養。

在拳擊比賽期間，你無法直接控制你的猴子，但在比賽間隙你可以做一些事情，例如補充它的生命值、耐力或兩者。您還可以建議它使用什麼策略來對抗對手。這些比賽通過計數或擊倒對手來獲勝，但是如果在確定獲勝者之前時間耗盡，則獲勝者是比賽結束時生命值最高的猴子。

Pokemon Pinball (USA, Australia) (Rumble.key: Pokemon Pinball (USA, Australia) (Rumble Version) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Pokemon Pinball (USA, Australia) (Rumble.name: 畅销Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Pokemon Pinball (USA, Australia) (Rumble.original_desc: Discover a whole new way to collect Pokemon - by playing pinball!  Hit the targets with your Poke Ball to catch and evolve Pokemon.  The better you do, the more rare Pokemon you'll find!  Every Pokemon you catch is automatically recorded in your Pokedex - see if you catch all 150!  Some Pokemon appear only on the Red Field or only on the Blue Field, so you'll have to play them both to catch 'em all!
Pokemon Pinball (USA, Australia) (Rumble.desc: 探索收集神奇寶貝的全新方式 - 玩彈球！用你的精靈球擊中目標來捕捉和進化精靈寶可夢。你做得越好，你會發現越稀有的神奇寶貝！您捕獲的每個 Pokemon 都會自動記錄在您的 Pokedex 中 - 看看您是否捕獲了全部 150 個！有些神奇寶貝只出現在紅場或只出現在藍場，所以你必須同時玩它們才能抓住它們！

Bugs Bunny in - Crazy Castle 4 (USA).name: 喷神James节目列表
Bugs Bunny in - Crazy Castle 4 (USA).original_desc:
Bugs Bunny in Crazy Castle 4 is the second game in the Crazy Castle series for the Game Boy Color.

Like in the previous three games you play as Bugs Bunny. This time you have to find your way to the mysterious Crazy Castle. You will pass through a wide variety of locations in which you will encounter familiar Looney Tunes characters such as Taz, Yosemite Sam, Wile E. Coyote, Daffy Duck and Elmer Fudd.

Bugs Bunny can climb stairs and ladders, jump ropes and springs, and use a large amount of items such as hammers to break rocks, carrots to replenish health, weapons to knock out enemies and pick-axes to climb over rocks.

There are more than 60 levels. In each you will have to find eight keys to unlock the door to the next level. Various traps will bar you way, including ice floors, conveyor belts, moving floors and disintegrating platforms.
Bugs Bunny in - Crazy Castle 4 (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Magi Nation (USA).name: 魔法師國度
Magi Nation (USA).original_desc: What would you do if you found yourself in a strange land, face-to-face with a mysterious presence and catapulted into an adventure to save an entire civilization? Well, find out! Explore a world of color and imagination that will challenge your every notion of reality. Experience the rush of dueling a Shadow Magi, with everything on the line. Find yourself going toe-to-toe with the awesome Timber Hyren, or the gargantuan Ormagon. Be the savior of an entire civilization. And find uses for jellybeans that you never thought possible.
Magi Nation (USA).desc: 如果你發現自己身處一片陌生的土地，面對一個神秘的存在，並開始一場拯救整個文明的冒險，你會怎麼做？好吧，找出來！探索色彩和想像力的世界，挑戰您對現實的每一個概念。體驗與暗影法師決鬥的快感，一切都危在旦夕。發現自己正在與令人敬畏的木海倫或巨大的奧馬貢正面交鋒。成為整個文明的救世主。並找到您從未想過的軟心豆粒糖的用途。

Azure Dreams (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Co.name: 微軟模擬飛行 (2020年遊戲)
Azure Dreams (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Co.original_desc:
The huge Monster Tower stands near the village Monsbaiya. It is populated by vicious monsters, and few dare enter it. But the monsters in the tower lay eggs, and whoever takes possession of such an egg, can tame a monster which will come out of it, and those monsters, called "familiars", will help their tamers in times of danger. Some brave adventurers dared to enter the tower and to take the eggs. One of them was called Guy. He was killed in the monster tower. Now his son Koh is fifteen, and he is allowed to try his luck in the tower.

You control Koh and his party of "familiars" in this unusual "monster-taming" RPG. You must capture the eggs from the tower, bring them home, grow monsters and tame them. During battles, you assign different commands to them. Different species have different abilities and need different approach. The battles system is a mixture of real time and turn based combat. Unlike most other console RPGs, there are no special battle screens.
Azure Dreams (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Co.desc:
巨大的怪物塔矗立在蒙斯拜亞村附近。這裡充滿了兇惡的怪物，很少有人敢進入其中。但是塔里的怪物會產蛋，誰擁有了這樣的蛋，就可以馴服從裡面出來的怪物，而那些被稱為“使魔”的怪物會在危險時幫助馴服者。一些勇敢的冒險家敢於進入塔樓並拿走雞蛋。其中一位名叫蓋伊。他在怪物塔里被殺了。現在他的兒子許已經十五歲了，他被允許在塔里碰碰運氣。

在這款不尋常的“馴服怪物”角色扮演遊戲中，你控制 Koh 和他的“眷屬”隊伍。你必須從塔上捕獲雞蛋，將它們帶回家，培育怪物並馴服它們。在戰鬥中，您向他們分配不同的命令。不同的物種有不同的能力，需要不同的方法。戰鬥系統是實時戰鬥和回合製戰鬥的混合體。與大多數其他主機角色扮演遊戲不同，沒有特殊的戰鬥畫面。

Revelations - The Demon Slayer (USA) (SG.key: Revelations - The Demon Slayer (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Revelations - The Demon Slayer (USA) (SG.name: 啟示錄：惡魔殺手
Revelations - The Demon Slayer (USA) (SG.original_desc: The Last Bible series is set in a fantasy world patterned after the ancient Middle East. In this world, humans have learned to call upon the energy of the world, called Gaia. The hero, El, has studied Gaia, but on the day of his graduation, strange creatures begin to appear. Together with his companions, he sets out to defeat the Gaia Masters that are bringing monsters to their world.
Revelations - The Demon Slayer (USA) (SG.desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

Survival Kids (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB C.name: 微小世界生存戰
Survival Kids (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB C.original_desc:
When on a pleasure cruise for his tenth birthday, a young boy is swept castaway to a remote island by a fierce storm that destroys the entire ship.  With no family or friends, he must fend for himself on this strange, seemingly uninhabited island and ultimately find a way to return home.

Survival Kids is presented in an overhead action-RPG style similar to Link's Awakening.  Players must try to survive through each day by getting enough rest, eating food and drinking water regularly.  This can be risky, as certain foods such as mushrooms can have varying effects including paralysis and poison, while other foods can go rotten and make you sick if you eat it.

The game also features a unique "merge" system, which allows you to create a number of different items by combining two other items.  For example, combining bark and a stick would produce kindling, while using ivy with a bent stick could create a bow.  There are plenty of useless items that can be made in addition to the essentials, so it's up to the player to think as to what could be helpful in their quest to survive.
Survival Kids (USA) (SGB Enhanced) (GB C.desc:
在一次慶祝他十歲生日的遊輪上，一個小男孩被一場猛烈的風暴捲到了一個偏遠的島嶼上，風暴摧毀了整艘船。沒有家人或朋友，他必須在這個陌生的、看似無人居住的島嶼上自力更生，並最終找到回家的方法。

《Survival Kids》以類似於《林克的覺醒》的架空動作角色扮演遊戲風格呈現。玩家必須通過充足的休息、定期進食和飲水來努力度過每一天。這可能有風險，因為某些食物（例如蘑菇）可能會產生不同的影響，包括麻痺和中毒，而其他食物如果吃了就會腐爛並讓人生病。

該遊戲還具有獨特的“合併”系統，允許您通過組合其他兩個項目來創建許多不同的項目。例如，將樹皮和棍子結合起來可以產生引火物，而使用常春藤和彎曲的棍子可以產生弓。除了必需品之外，還有很多無用的物品可以製作，所以玩家需要思考什麼對他們的生存有幫助。

Tetris DX (World) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Com.name: 俄罗斯方块 (Game Boy)
Tetris DX (World) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Com.original_desc:
Tetris DX requires you to place different shaped blocks which fall from the top of the screen, along the bottom of the screen to make up a line which then disappears from the screen. Watch out though, if you cant fill the gaps and the blocks fill up to the top of the screen the game is over.

Tetris DX features 4 one-player modes and two-player mode using the Universal Game Link Cable.
Tetris DX (World) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Com.desc:
Tetris DX 要求您放置從屏幕頂部掉落的不同形狀的塊，沿著屏幕底部形成一條線，然後從屏幕上消失。但請注意，如果您無法填補空白並且方塊填滿屏幕頂部，則遊戲結束。

Tetris DX 具有 4 種單人遊戲模式和使用通用遊戲連接線的兩人遊戲模式。

Conker's Pocket Tales (USA, Europe) (En,.key: Conker's Pocket Tales (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible)
Conker's Pocket Tales (USA, Europe) (En,.name: Xbox游戏列表
Conker's Pocket Tales (USA, Europe) (En,.original_desc:
Conker has a party with his girlfriend. The Evil Acorn breaks up the party. The Acorn takes Conker's girlfriend. Now Conker must rescue his girlfriend. The game also worked for Game Boy and Super Game Boy. 

Conker travels through many levels, trying to find presents that the Evil Acorn has stolen. Conker is equipped with a slingshot to battle enemies, such as mutant plants, snakes, and others. Players encounter a few minigames on their adventure, including olympic-type games. If a player started on Game Boy, they had to play through the game before they could play on Game Boy Color. This worked the other way around, also.
Conker's Pocket Tales (USA, Europe) (En,.desc:
康克和他的女朋友舉辦派對。邪惡的橡子驅散了聚會。橡子帶走了康克的女朋友。現在康克必須營救他的女朋友。該遊戲還適用於 Game Boy 和 Super Game Boy。

康克穿越多個關卡，試圖找到邪惡橡子偷走的禮物。Conker 配備彈弓來對抗突變植物、蛇等敵人。玩家在冒險中會遇到一些迷你游戲，包括奧林匹克類型的遊戲。如果玩家開始使用 Game Boy，他們必須先玩完遊戲，然後才能在 Game Boy Color 上玩。反之亦然。

Lufia - The Legend Returns (USA).name: 史克威尔艾尼克斯电子游戏列表
Lufia - The Legend Returns (USA).original_desc: The island of the Sinistrals, Doom Island, sank deep into the sea after the second Doom Island War. It was believed to be in an eternal sleep, but has once again begun silently beating, preparing to make its appearance in the sky for the third time. The evil Sinistrals have again been resurrected and released an unforseen terror on the land. A force has awaken witin you... a spiritual flow that draws you to a conflict that will save the world! The power of Maxim's legendary bloodline lives in you... The thread of destiny guides you through an adventurous journey looking for an unknown destination!
Lufia - The Legend Returns (USA).desc: 辛尼斯特拉人的島嶼，末日島，在第二次末日島戰爭後沉入海底深處。人們認為它處於永恆的睡眠中，但它再次開始無聲地跳動，準備第三次出現在天空中。邪惡的西尼斯特拉再次復活，並在這片土地上釋放了不可預見的恐怖。一股力量在你體內覺醒……一股精神之流將你吸引到一場拯救世界的衝突中！馬克西姆傳奇血脈的力量就在你體內……命運之線引導你踏上冒險之旅，尋找未知的目的地！

Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasi.key: Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasion of Team GR! (Japan) (Translated)
Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasi.original_name: Pokémon Card GB2 : GR Dan Sanjou!
Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasi.name: 神奇寶貝卡 GB2：GR 丹三條！
Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasi.original_desc:
Pokémon Card GB2: Great Rocket-Dan Sanjo!, released March 28, 2001, is the Japanese-exclusive sequel to the original Pokémon Trading Card Game, also for the Game Boy Color. Like its predecessor, the game was developed by Hudson Soft and published by Nintendo, and was first announced in January 2001 by Japanese website WatchImpress. It includes new enhancements, such as the ability to choose the gender of the player character, a training mode to help new players, a Deck Diagnosis to rate the effectiveness of a player's deck, and a new group of antagonists known as Team Great Rocket. The game features all cards from the original game, along with new cards from the fourth set, Team Rocket, as well as cards originally exclusive to Japanese vending machines and the Pokémon Trading Card Game Instructional Video Intro Pack, bringing the total number of cards to 445. 

Like the previous title, players must travel across the game world challenging non-player characters to simulated battles using rules adopted from the original tabletop version. All locations from the original are present, along with a new setting known as GR Island which contains its own Battle Masters for players to encounter. By defeating a total of 16 Battle Masters on the old and new islands, players may challenge the game's final boss, King Biruritchi. Though an English release in North America was deemed "likely" by website IGN in 2001, the game has not been made available outside Japan. Pokémon Card GB2 earned a 29 out of 40 score from Japanese Weekly Famitsu magazine.
Pokemon Trading Card Game 2 - The Invasi.desc:
《精靈寶可夢卡牌 GB2：偉大的火箭 - 丹三條！ 》於 2001 年 3 月 28 日發行，是原版精靈寶可夢集換式卡牌遊戲的日本獨占續作，同樣適用於 Game Boy Color。與前作一樣，該遊戲由 Hudson Soft 開發、任天堂發行，並於 2001 年 1 月由日本網站 WatchImpress 首次發布。它包括新的增強功能，例如選擇玩家角色性別的能力、幫助新玩家的訓練模式、評估玩家牌組有效性的牌組診斷，以及稱為“偉大火箭隊”的新對手組。該遊戲包含原版遊戲中的所有卡牌，以及第四組火箭隊的新卡牌，以及最初僅在日本自動售貨機上使用的卡牌和神奇寶貝集換式卡牌遊戲教學視頻介紹包，使卡牌總數達到 445 張。

與前作一樣，玩家必須穿越遊戲世界，挑戰非玩家角色，使用原始桌面版本採用的規則進行模擬戰鬥。原作中的所有地點都存在，還有一個名為 GR 島的新場景，其中包含自己的戰斗大師供玩家遇到。通過擊敗新舊島嶼總共 16 位戰斗大師，玩家可以挑戰遊戲的最終 Boss 比魯里奇國王。儘管 2001 年 IGN 網站認為“有可能”在北美髮行英文版本，但該遊戲尚未在日本以外地區發行。《Pokémon Card GB2》在日本《Fami通》雜誌的評分中獲得了 29 分（滿分 40 分）。

Super Mario Bros. Deluxe (USA, Europe) (.name: 超级马力欧兄弟
Super Mario Bros. Deluxe (USA, Europe) (.original_desc:
The Mushroom Kingdom has been invaded by the Koopa, a tribe of turtles who possess dark magic. Their king Bowser has transformed all its inhabitants into stones, bricks, and mushrooms; he has also captured Princess Toadstool. She is the only one who can break the evil spell.
Imprisoned in a castle deep in Bowser's new found kingdom, Mario, a humble plumber, hears of the tragedy and sets out to free her.

Run, jump, and throw fireballs to defeat the evil Bowser and his minions.

The game features the original 1985 game, a challenge mode, and versus game option. Also included are records, an album, and a toy box.
Super Mario Bros. Deluxe (USA, Europe) (.desc:
蘑菇王國遭到了庫帕族的入侵，庫帕族是一個擁有黑暗魔法的海龜部落。他們的國王鮑澤將所有居民變成了石頭、磚塊和蘑菇；他還捕獲了傘菌公主。她是唯一能夠打破邪惡咒語的人。
馬里奧是一名卑微的水管工，被囚禁在庫巴新建立的王國深處的一座城堡裡，他聽說了這場悲劇，並開始營救她。

奔跑、跳躍和投擲火球來擊敗邪惡的庫巴和他的爪牙。

該遊戲採用 1985 年原版遊戲、挑戰模式和對抗遊戲選項。還包括唱片、專輯和玩具盒。

Kirby - Tilt 'n' Tumble (USA).name: 畅销Game Boy游戏列表
Kirby - Tilt 'n' Tumble (USA).original_desc:
King Dedede is at it again, this time taking all of the stars from the sky. Thankfully for Dreamland, Kirby has returned to stop the evil King once more. But this time, he will need your help more then ever before.

Kirby has been turned into a ball, and it is up to you to tilt and turn the game table so that Kirby can dodge enemies and get the the end goal. To do this, you must actually tilt the Game Boy Color/Advance console, thanks to the inbuilt motion sensor in the cartridge. Every move you make determines where the little pink ball goes.
Kirby - Tilt 'n' Tumble (USA).desc:
帝帝帝王再次出手，這次奪走了天上所有的星星。感謝夢境，卡比回來了，再次阻止了邪惡的國王。但這一次，他比以往任何時候都更需要你的幫助。

卡比變成了一個球，你需要傾斜和轉動遊戲桌，讓卡比躲避敵人並達到最終目標。為此，您必須實際傾斜 Game Boy Color/Advance 控制台，這要歸功於卡帶中的內置運動傳感器。你的每一個動作都決定了粉紅色小球的去向。

Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventu.key: Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventure (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventu.original_name: Walt Disney's The Jungle Book : Mowgli's Wild Adventure
Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventu.name: 華特迪士尼的《叢林之書：毛克利的狂野冒險》
Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventu.original_desc: Mowgli's Wild Adventure is a typical 2D platform game for the Game Boy Color. You play as the young Mowgli who can walk, jump, run, climb and crawl. Levels come in various jungle related themes including a ruined temple. Mowgli learns a new special move in each level. He can throw fruit at hostile animals to defend himself. Furthermore Mowgli has to interact with his environment by pulling switches to open doors or douse fire with water. You can collect diamonds for extra lives and apples for health. In each boss level you have to collect seven icons in a race to win the stage.
Jungle Book, The - Mowgli's Wild Adventu.desc: Mowgli's Wild Adventure 是 Game Boy Color 的典型 2D 平台遊戲。你扮演年輕的莫格利，他可以走、跳、跑、攀爬和爬行。關卡有各種與叢林相關的主題，包括一座廢棄的寺廟。毛克利在每個關卡中都會學習新的特殊動作。他可以向敵對的動物扔水果來保護自己。此外，莫格利還必須通過拉動開關來打開門或用水澆滅火來與周圍的環境進行互動。您可以收集鑽石來獲得額外的生命，收集蘋果來獲得健康。在每個老闆級別中，您必須在比賽中收集七個圖標才能贏得舞台。

Hamtaro - Ham-Hams Unite! (USA).name: 哈姆太郎：火腿火腿聯合起來！
Hamtaro - Ham-Hams Unite! (USA).original_desc:
It's Hamtaro time! Boss has a big secret in store for the Ham-Hams, but he's gotta find them first! The guy's got too much on his hands already, so he sends the loveable Carrot-headed Hamtaro out on the search for the Ham-Hams. The thing is... Hamtaro's gotta learn some hip Ham-chat if he wants everyone to listen to him. So as he ventures on in the game, he becomes the street-wise hipster, learning Ham-chat and getting into tons of adventures... and trouble! 

Make friends for life! Go out and have an adventure! Remember... get everyone back to the clubhouse to see what Boss's big secret is...

This game is based on the anime Tottoko Hamtaro, created by Ritsuko Kawai.
Hamtaro - Ham-Hams Unite! (USA).desc:
哈姆太郎時間到了！老闆對火腿火腿隊有一個大秘密，但他必須先找到他們！這傢伙手上的事情已經太多了，所以他派了可愛的胡蘿蔔頭哈姆太郎去尋找火腿。問題是……如果哈姆太郎想讓每個人都聽他說話，他就必須學習一些時髦的火腿聊天。因此，當他在遊戲中冒險時，他成為了街頭聰明的嬉皮士，學習火腿聊天並陷入大量的冒險......和麻煩！

結交一生的朋友！出去冒險吧！記住……讓大家都回會所看看Boss的大秘密是什麼……

該遊戲改編自川井律子創作的動漫《哈姆太郎 Tottoko Hamtaro》。

Wendy - Every Witch Way (USA, Europe).name: 爱莉安娜·格兰德
Wendy - Every Witch Way (USA, Europe).original_desc:
While exploring her house's attic, the little witch Wendy discovers a treasure chest.  Upon opening it, magical stones are released from their prison, and head to a castle which is suspended in the sky. The power of the stones upsets gravity, and the castle comes crashing to the ground, right on top of Wendy's house!  It's up to Wendy to set things right again!

Wendy: Every Witch Way is a combination of a side-scrolling platformer and a puzzle game.  As Wendy, players explore the castle in search of the troublesome stones that have upset gravity.  Wendy has the ability to control gravity herself – by pressing up or down on the control pad while jumping, Wendy will cause gravity to reverse in that direction.  Most enemies and obstacles in the game world are also affected by the gravity switching – you'll need to manipulate gravity frequently to progress through the game's different puzzles.

Stars can be used to power up Wendy's magic.  For every star that she collects (to a maximum of five), her magic will increase.  Beginning with a small weak shot, you can power your magic up to a spread shot that fires in three directions.  The stars also act as Wendy's health meter – if you get hit, you'll lose a star, as well as some magical power.  Get hit when you have no stars left, and you'll lose a life.

At the end of every world, there is a short bonus stage with Wendy riding on her broomstick.  In these stages, you must attack enemies and collect stars as Wendy automatically flies to the next world.
Wendy - Every Witch Way (USA, Europe).desc:
小女巫溫蒂在探索她家的閣樓時，發現了一個寶箱。打開它後，魔法石就會從監獄中釋放出來，前往一座懸浮在天空中的城堡。石頭的力量打破了重力，城堡轟然倒塌，就在溫迪房子的頂上！溫蒂要把事情重新擺正！

Wendy: Every Witch Way 是橫向捲軸平台遊戲和益智遊戲的結合。玩家扮演溫迪，探索城堡，尋找擾亂重力的麻煩石頭。溫蒂有能力自己控制重力——跳躍時向上或向下按控制板，溫蒂將使重力朝該方向反轉。遊戲世界中的大多數敵人和障礙物也會受到重力切換的影響 - 您需要經常操縱重力才能完成遊戲的不同謎題。

星星可以用來增強溫蒂的魔法。她收集的每顆星星（最多五顆）都會增加她的魔力。從一個小而微弱的射擊開始，你可以將你的魔法增強到向三個方向發射的分散射擊。這些星星也充當溫蒂的生命值——如果你被擊中，你將失去一顆星星，以及一些魔法力量。當你沒有星星時被擊中，你就會失去生命。

在每個世界的盡頭，都有一個簡短的獎勵階段，溫蒂騎著她的掃帚。在這些階段中，你必須攻擊敵人並收集星星，因為溫蒂會自動飛到下一個世界。

Monster Rancher Explorer (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Monster Rancher Explorer (USA).original_desc: Monster Rancher Explorer is an updated port of Tecmo's 1987 NES game, Solomon's Key and features environments, characters and monsters from the Monster Rancher series of games. The game is a platformer with action elements. Each level requires a puzzle to be solved within a time limit, giving the successful player a key to unlock the next level. Bad monsters will attack on most levels, so in addition to moving blocks to get to the key on each level, a player needs to dispatch bad monsters before being killed by them. There are good monsters to meet, several hidden bonus levels, bonus items, and treasure to be found.
Monster Rancher Explorer (USA).desc: Monster Rancher Explorer 是 Tecmo 1987 年 NES 遊戲《所羅門之鑰》的更新版本，具有 Monster Rancher 系列遊戲中的環境、角色和怪物。該遊戲是一款帶有動作元素的平台遊戲。每個級別都需要在限定時間內解決一個謎題，為成功的玩家提供解鎖下一級別的鑰匙。壞怪物會在大多數關卡上進行攻擊，因此除了移動方塊到達每個關卡的關鍵之外，玩家還需要在被壞怪物殺死之前消滅它們。有好怪物等著你，還有幾個隱藏的獎勵關卡、獎勵物品和寶藏等你發現。

Warlocked (USA).name: 战锁
Warlocked (USA).original_desc:
In the perilous world of Warlocked, a ferocious war is raging between the Human forces of Queen Azarel and the Beast horde of Chief Zog. Players can control either side, each of them offers 30 missions. 

Warlocked brings real-time strategy gaming to the Boy Color set in a fantasy warfare scenario. The key to victory is a balanced mix of resource gathering, building, exploration and combat. Adding a magical twist to the straightforward action is the presence of wizards, each of whom has one powerful spell. While some wizards can convert enemy troops to your side, others can change them into chickens or skeletons. More than 20 kinds of wizards are hidden throughout the game.

Using a Game Link Cable, you can test your war skills against another player. Two-player battle maps are earned by progressing through the single-player game. Warlocked also enables you to build your own personal armies with resources that you have saved in your campaigns in single player mode, and then trade them with a friend using the infrared ports on the console.
Warlocked (USA).desc:
在危險的術士世界中，阿扎瑞爾女王的人類軍隊和佐格酋長的野獸部落之間正在爆發一場殘酷的戰爭。玩家可以控制任何一方，每方提供 30 個任務。

《Warlocked》為 Boy Color 的奇幻戰爭場景帶來了實時策略遊戲。勝利的關鍵是資源收集、建設、探索和戰鬥的平衡組合。巫師的出現為簡單的動作增添了魔力，每個巫師都有一個強大的咒語。雖然有些巫師可以將敵方軍隊轉變為你的一方，但其他巫師可以將他們變成雞或骷髏。遊戲中隱藏著20多種巫師。

使用遊戲連接線，您可以測試您與其他玩家的戰爭技巧。兩人戰斗地圖是通過單人遊戲的進展獲得的。《Warlocked》還使您能夠使用您在單人遊戲模式中的戰役中保存的資源來建立自己的個人軍隊，然後使用控制台上的紅外端口與朋友進行交易。

Harvest Moon 2 GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc:
Rebuild the farm of your grandfather and start raising cows, chickens and sheep. Keep them happy and they?ll make you rich! Discover the fantastic Harvest Moon world with cool friends ready to help you succeed in your mission.

- The awaited Harvest Moon sequel for GBC with even more fun!

- Hours and hours of gameplay
- Hidden arcade games include Mole Bash and Cherry Cup Horse Race
- Special Game Link cable options allow trading between Harvest Moon 2 and Legend of the River King 2
Harvest Moon 2 GBC (USA) (SGB Enhanced).desc:
重建你祖父的農場並開始飼養牛、雞和羊。讓他們快樂，他們會讓你變得富有！與酷炫的朋友一起探索奇妙的《Harvest Moon》世界，他們隨時準備幫助您成功完成任務。

- 期待已久的 GBC 牧場物語續集，帶來更多樂趣！
- 選擇扮演男孩或女孩農民
- 遊戲時間和時間
- 隱藏的街機遊戲包括 Mole Bash 和 Cherry Cup Horse Race

Project S-11 (USA).name: Xbox Game Pass
Project S-11 (USA).original_desc: When a vicious crew of aliens decides to hone in on Earth and do some damage, you're the planet's only hope for salvation. You'd better be in top form as you command a killer spacecraft out into orbit in hopes of rescuing humanity from unthinkable misery. Each of the eight stages in PROJECT S-11 poses unique challenges, and each setting is more harrowing than the last. Although you're going it alone in this one, there are four different types of power-ups hidden throughout the game to give the boost you'll need to survive and wipe out the terrifying extra-terrestrials. You'll benefit from a complete statistical readout that adorns the right side of your screen, keeping you abreast of all necessary information: your score, your ship's armor level, and the number of bombs you have stored up for combat. The game's fast-paced action looks excellent in full color, and the intensity of it will have you breaking a sweat before you're through the first level. Those aliens had better look out with you at the controls, Earth stands a fighting chance.
Project S-11 (USA).desc: 當一群邪惡的外星人決定侵入地球並造成一些破壞時，你是拯救這個星球的唯一希望。當你指揮一艘殺手級宇宙飛船進入軌道，希望將人類從難以想像的苦難中拯救出來時，你最好保持最佳狀態。PROJECT S-11 的八個階段中的每一個都帶來了獨特的挑戰，並且每個場景都比上一個更加痛苦。雖然你在這款遊戲中要孤軍奮戰，但整個遊戲中隱藏著四種不同類型的能量提升，可以為你提供生存和消滅可怕的外星人所需的動力。您將受益於屏幕右側的完整統計讀數，讓您隨時了解所有必要的信息：您的分數、您的艦船的裝甲等級以及您為戰鬥而儲存的炸彈數量。遊戲的快節奏動作在全彩中看起來非常出色，其強度會讓你在通關第一個關卡之前就流汗。那些外星人最好和你一起小心駕駛，地球還有機會。

Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro.key: Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro no Sho (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (GB Compatible) (Translated)
Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro.original_name: Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children : Kuro no Sho
Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro.name: 新女神轉生蒔蘿兒童：黑之章
Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro.original_desc:
The dark world of Megami Tensei (Megaten), with its heavy demonology and complex religious and moral problems, becomes much more cute and friendly in "Devil Children". The Black Book edition tells the story of Kai Setsuna, a boy who studies in the fifth grade of Harajuku Elementray school in modern-day Japan. His younger brother was abducted by monsters. With the help of his sidekick Cool, a one-headed Cerberus demon, Kai have to stop the demonic invasion from another world.

Similar to Pokemon, you can "collect" demons, raise them, and make them fight for you. This gameplay feature also continues the tradition of Megami Tensei universe, in where demon summoning has always been an integral part of the games. This is basically "Megami Tensei for kids".
Shin Megami Tensei Devil Children - Kuro.desc:
女神轉生（Megaten）的黑暗世界，有著沉重的魔學和復雜的宗教道德問題，在《惡魔之子》中變得更加可愛和友善。黑皮書版講述了在現代日本原宿小學五年級就讀的男孩 Kai Setsuna 的故事。他的弟弟被怪物綁架了。在他的伙伴酷（Cerberus 惡魔）的幫助下，凱必須阻止來自另一個世界的惡魔入侵。

與口袋妖怪類似，你可以“收集”惡魔，飼養牠們，並讓它們為你而戰。這一遊戲玩法也延續了《女神轉生》宇宙的傳統，惡魔召喚一直是遊戲中不可或缺的一部分。這基本上是“兒童版的女神轉生”。
